programme.title: ABC News Mornings (2024)
programme.desc: When big stories break, turn to Gemma Veness in the morning to bring you whats happening and why it matters. ABC News has more reporters in more places, serving and connecting communities and telling your stories.

programme.title: ABC News At Noon (2024)
programme.desc: The leading news at lunchtime. Ros Childs brings you the days top stories and the latest news as it unfolds, with reporters in the community across Australia and around the world reporting on the issues that matter to you.

programme.title: Pizza!
programme.desc: Its Easy Entertaining with The Cook Up. Adam is joined by two pizza crust-dough-dians, Luke Powell from Bella Brutta and Jess Smith from City Oltra, for a pizza party.

programme.title: Anger
programme.desc: Of our six core emotions, anger gets the worst rap. It has the potential to destroy, but as Myf Warhurst discovers, theres a thin line separating its destructive power from the constructive anger that motivates change.

programme.title: War On Waste S3
programme.desc: Craig Reucassel confronts Aussies about the amount of food were throwing away. He gives the suburban street challengers some expert tips for ways to reduce food waste and uncovers the truth about compostable food packaging.

programme.title: Out Of Left Field
programme.desc: From aluminium bats, to broken jaws, and a piglet and a duck, were taking a romp through the 80s most outrageous and unforgettable moments that caught us by surprise, captured our imaginations and often made us smile.

programme.title: Asha
programme.desc: Sri Lankas Blue Giant Guardian: A pile of floating whale poo launched Asha de Voss career. As global shipping lanes around Sri Lanka get busier, she is on a mission to protect the blue whales that call these waters home.

programme.title: Afternoon Briefing (2024)
programme.desc: Live from Parliament House in Canberra, Greg Jennett brings you everything you need to know about politics, national and global affairs today, speaking with the key decision makers and stakeholders on issues in the news.

programme.title: ABC News with Joe OBrien (2024)
programme.desc: Joe OBrien brings you a comprehensive summary of the days events, with the latest breaking news, in depth coverage of the top stories, live crosses, interviews and explainers to bring you up to speed on whats going on.

programme.title: ABC National News (2024)

programme.title: Hannah Gadsbys OZ S1
programme.desc: If the Australian art cannon is to be believed, this country was founded by an army of pioneer blokes in hats. Hannah picks beneath the paint of this hyper-masculine portrait to uncover a more feminine vision of our country.

programme.title: Mithu Sen, Classics for Kids, Bandura
programme.desc: Indian artist Mithu Sen brings mOTHERTONGUE to ACCA in Melbourne. ABC Classic shares lesser-known music for kids, we meet Dr Kirsten Lyttle to learn about her multimedia art practice and hear from a master of the Bandura.

programme.title: The Way We Wore S1
programme.desc: In this final episode, Celeste Barber tracks the ascent of Australias fashion sector, tracing its roots from early bespoke seamstresses to the multi-billion-dollar international enterprise it is today.

programme.title: How the Black Swan Gave Maroochydore its Name

programme.title: Kompang Abang Zabidi
programme.desc: Zabidi, pemuda kampung yang terdesak untuk mendapatkan wang, menyertai pertandingan Pesta Kompang Kampung-Kampung yang menawarkan hadiah wang tunai dan menghadapi pelbagai rintangan yang mencuit hati sehingga akhirnya beliau berjaya memenangi pertandingan itu.

programme.title: Kembara Chef Wan 2022
programme.desc: Datuk Chef Wan menerokai kehidupan masyarakat setempat dari segi budaya, keunikkan dan juga pemandangan indah setiap lokasi yang diteriokainya

programme.title: Pesta Muda Mudi
programme.desc: Memberi penghargaan kepada lagu-lagu pop Malaysia sepanjang zaman dari tahun 1930 hingga ke tahun 2010 untuk dipersembahkan oleh artis tempatan dalam bentuk akustik.

programme.title: Indonesian Street Food
programme.desc: Sebuah dokumentari yang meneroka tentang masakan makanan jalanan di seluruh Indonesia

programme.title: Tikam
programme.desc: NJ, Akma, Ed, Ika, Mike dan Sap menjumpai mayat Shahrol, mati bunuh diri di pejabat. Rupanya kegiatan pecah amanah mereka telah bocor dan di antara mereka adalah pengkhianat.

programme.title: Derita Untuk Bahagia

programme.title: Jejak Jepun Jihan S3

programme.desc: Betul Ke Bohong? musim keenam membawa Johan sebagai hos dan Ray, Haniff, Angah dan Achey sebagai kapten kumpulan, Nantikan siapa artis jemputan untuk minggu ini

programme.title: JOZAN
programme.desc: Duo pelawak paling popular kini kembali setelah 7 tahun tidak bersama menghiburkan peminat menerusi program bual bicara terbaru yang pasti menghiburkan anda.

programme.title: Seminggu Sekali
programme.desc: Bersama Douglas Lim and Adibah Noor, saksikan mereka mengupas dan menyampaikan isu semasa kepada masyarakat secara santai dan lucu.

programme.title: Ngaroot Ngaroot
programme.desc: Sebuah sketsa yang menampilkan finalis MLM 2017 membawakan watak lucu yang bertemakan isu semasa. Selain itu, program ini turut memaparkan nilai murni dan pengajaran yang berguna buat penonton.

programme.title: Super Game Boy The Series
programme.desc: Danial dan kawan-kawannya Ayu, Bob dan Nina kembali beraksi dengan gelagat mereka yang lucu dan menarik. Berjayakah misi mereka di dalam setiap episod? Jom kita saksikannya.

programme.title: Mana Satu
programme.desc: Rancangan memasak yang menguji suami selebriti mengenali masakan isterinya atau tidak. Isteri perlu memasak untuk suaminya tetapi dalam masa yang sama selebriti jemputan juga akan memasak menu yang sama.

programme.title: Arena Panas : Pro VS Bro S1
programme.desc: Bersama barisan atlit handal dan selebriti popular tanah air, sakasikan mereka berentap dalam acara sukan dan permainan menghiburkan anda.

programme.title: Mamu, Masaklah Kau!
programme.desc: Rancangan masakan yang menguji kreativiti dan kecekapan selebriti untuk menyediakan hidangan kepada tetamu misteri menggunakan 3 bahan yang tersedia.

programme.title: Isteri VS Tunang
programme.desc: Alana Sofea mencabar keegoan Zaim Azfar sehingga mereka berkahwin. Puas dapat menyahut cabaran Alana, Zaim kembali menjalin hubungan dengan bekas kekasihnya, Amira Irdina.

programme.title: Malaysian Sihir Stories
programme.desc: Perihal adik-beradik yang mempunyai deria keenam dan cuba menyelesaikan kes-kes berkaitan dengan sihir yang mengganggu orang di sekeliling mereka.

programme.title: Misteri Sofa Lama
programme.desc: Sepasang suami isteri membeli sebuah sofa lama di kedai barangan terpakai namun perwatakan suaminya mula berubah dan mula obses terhadap sofa tersebut

programme.desc: Duo pelawak paling popular kini kembali setelah 7 tahun tidak bersama menghiburkan peminat menerusi program bual bicara terbaru yang pasti menghiburkan anda.

programme.title: Seminggu Sekali
programme.desc: Bersama Douglas Lim and Adibah Noor, saksikan mereka mengupas dan menyampaikan isu semasa kepada masyarakat secara santai dan lucu.

programme.title: Ngaroot Ngaroot
programme.desc: Sebuah sketsa yang menampilkan finalis MLM 2017 membawakan watak lucu yang bertemakan isu semasa. Selain itu, program ini turut memaparkan nilai murni dan pengajaran yang berguna buat penonton.

programme.title: Super Game Boy The Series
programme.desc: Danial dan kawan-kawannya Ayu, Bob dan Nina kembali beraksi dengan gelagat mereka yang lucu dan menarik. Berjayakah misi mereka di dalam setiap episod? Jom kita saksikannya.

programme.title: Mana Satu
programme.desc: Rancangan memasak yang menguji suami selebriti mengenali masakan isterinya atau tidak. Isteri perlu memasak untuk suaminya tetapi dalam masa yang sama selebriti jemputan juga akan memasak menu yang sama.

programme.title: Arena Panas : Pro VS Bro S1
programme.desc: Bersama barisan atlit handal dan selebriti popular tanah air, sakasikan mereka berentap dalam acara sukan dan permainan menghiburkan anda.

programme.title: Mamu, Masaklah Kau!
programme.desc: Rancangan masakan yang menguji kreativiti dan kecekapan selebriti untuk menyediakan hidangan kepada tetamu misteri menggunakan 3 bahan yang tersedia.

programme.title: Temasya Sukan Kelaut
programme.desc: Program sukan yang diselitkan elemen komedi dengan menampilkan barisan pelawak tanah air serta barisan selebriti sukan terkenal.

programme.title: Malaysian Sihir Stories
programme.desc: Perihal adik-beradik yang mempunyai deria keenam dan cuba menyelesaikan kes-kes berkaitan dengan sihir yang mengganggu orang di sekeliling mereka.

programme.title: Mohon Hantuan
programme.desc: Akim seorang penulis novel romantik tiba-tiba dibuka hijabnya dan membolehkan dia untuk melihat hantu yang kemudiannya memohon bantuan Akim untuk mengubah rakan lelakinya menjadi romantik.

programme.title: Miss Lawak
programme.desc: Dihoskan oleh Dato Afdlin Shauki selain Erra Fazira and Dato AC Mizal sebagai juri tetap, siapakah di antara 18 gadis yang bakal merebut gelaran juara Miss Lawak 2019?

programme.title: Dosa
programme.desc: Menceritakan kisah Arumi yang sedang memandu kereta ketika bertengkar dengan Gio di telefon bimbitnya, Arumi begitu marah dengan Gio sehingga kereta Arumi merempuh sebuah bas.

programme.title: Expose Mistik: Kisah Seram
programme.desc: Sebuah rancangan yang memaparkan kisah-kisah seram yang sangat mistik.

programme.title: Carca Marba
programme.desc: Sebuah rancangan komedi yang pasti menghiburkan anda sekeluarga

programme.title: Bayangan Rindu (Bahagian 2)
programme.desc: Kisah hidup mati cinta Iddya dengan tiga orang lelaki iaitu Baein, Lutfi dan Kiew@Umar Aisy. Digarap oleh Erma Fatimah dari novel cinta popular karya Anis Ayuni. Dibintangi oleh Nad Zainal, Beto Kushairy, Zain Hamid dan Zahiril Adzim.

programme.title: M.A.I.D
programme.desc: Noorul meminta kerja sebagai orang gaji melalui agensi pekerjaan setelah kilang tempat kerjanya ditutup. Bermulalah episod Noorul sebagai orang gaji kepada anak Tan Sri yang sangat cerewet itu.

programme.title: Sepahtu Reunion Live 2023
programme.desc: Musim terbaharu, Jep, Rahim and Pak Ya serta tetamu jemputan pasti membuat anda tak kering gusi dengan punchline and pickupline mereka. Nantikan cameo yang bakal membuat anda terkejut di akhir rancangan.

programme.title: Polis Sentri The Series
programme.desc: Polis Sentri ialah sebuah program variasi yang menampilkan 10 artis tanah air termasuk personaliti sosial media. Misi mereka adalah untuk berjaya dalam semua cabaran yang diberi.

programme.title: Michael Angs Halal Kitchen
programme.desc: Michael bersama dengan tetamu jemputan akan berkongsi nasihat dan petua bagaimana pelbagai hidangan boleh dicipta semula untuk memenuhi citarasa masyarakat gastronomi yang halal.

programme.title: Motif Viral Junior
programme.desc: Saksikan aksi komedi yang pasti menghiburkan anda sekeluarga

programme.title: Ragam Cucu and Atuk
programme.desc: Dhia terpaksa tinggal bersama atuk and neneknya di kampung kerana ibu bapanya ke luar negara atas urusan kerja. Perkara itu amat mengujakan Dhia kerana dia suka untuk meluangkan masa bersama atuknya.

programme.title: Sukan Pejabat
programme.desc: Sebuah sitcom game show yang paling tidak adil di dunia dan memang tidak akan adil seperti realiti kehidupan di pejabat anda…mungkin?

programme.title: Girlfriend Aku Dari Neraka the Series
programme.desc: Kisah mengenai seorang jejaka bernama Rudi, yang merupakan seorang player dan sering kali bertukar teman wanita. Dia kemudian telah jatuh cinta dengan seorang gadis yang diidamkan. Pelbagai usaha telah dilakukan olehnya untuk memikat hati gadis tersebut

programme.title: Prankap Show
programme.desc: Saksikan selebriti popular merancang "prank" bersama geng mereka dan mengenakan mangsa terpilih. Berjayakan perancangan "prank" mereka? Sama-sama kita nantikan!

programme.title: Dee The Series
programme.desc: Dee bersama adik dan ibunya Amy, memulakan hidup baru di KL apabila Amy mendapat kerja baru di sebuah kolej swasta. Bermulalah satu dunia baru untuk Dee yang penuh dengan muzik, gelak ketawa dan air mata.

programme.title: Dee The Series
programme.desc: Dee bersama adik dan ibunya Amy, memulakan hidup baru di KL apabila Amy mendapat kerja baru di sebuah kolej swasta. Bermulalah satu dunia baru untuk Dee yang penuh dengan muzik, gelak ketawa dan air mata.

programme.title: Bonda Bonding
programme.desc: Artis terpilih setiap minggu akan melakukan pelbagai aktiviti bersama bonda mereka. Saksikan detik istimewa mereka ini

programme.title: Resipi
programme.desc: Radiah pindah semula ke rumah ibubapanya demi untuk menjaga ayahnya lalu mula memasak mengikut resipi arwah ibunya, dalam usahanya Radiah mula mempelajari tentang dirinya dan juga tentang ibu dan ayahnya.

programme.title: Dalang Prank
programme.desc: Sebuah rancangan hiburan prank yang melibatkan artis dan peserta yang menjadi dalang kepada prank masing-masing. Prank yang disukai oleh penonton akan dinobatkan Juara Dalang Prank dalam setiap episod.

programme.title: Jihan Show
programme.desc: Riuh rendah dibuatnya apabila Jihan berkumpul dengan teman-teman. Pelbagai topik jadi perbualan bila semua "girlfriends" bersatu.

programme.title: Makhluk Manis Dalam Bis
programme.desc: Pertemuan pertama Emil dengan Gaby di dalam bas, seorang gadis manis misteri yang dia panggil Sweet Creatures. Sejak itu Emil berusaha mencari keberadaan Gaby, yang tinggal bersama datuknya.

programme.title: Northumberland
programme.desc: Kate walks a 15-mile stretch of St Oswalds Way in Northumberland. Her starting point is the picturesque village of Alnmouth, once a leading grain port in the 18th century.

programme.title: Zambia
programme.desc: Ben journeys into Zambia to live with a British family who have built a safari lodge on the edge of a national park. In the process, Ben uncovers what motivates them to keep going in the face of challenges including fire and flooding.

programme.title: Jungles: In The Thick Of It
programme.desc: Jungles are home to 80% of all species but they cover just 2% of the planet. When animals in these crowded forests want to mate, the challenge is how to stand out from the crowd.

programme.title: Heartlands
programme.desc: Magical forests wrap around a labyrinth of waterways in Scandinavias heartlands. Here, lynxes, wolves and reindeer survive the ever-changing seasons through surprising alliances.

programme.title: Kevin Whately
programme.desc: Robson heads to Northumberland to meet his acting hero, Kevin Whately. The pair have a go at sand art, go to sea in a rowing boat and test their musical skills on the border pipes.

programme.title: Angela Lonsdale
programme.desc: Robson is reunited with longtime acting pal Angela Lonsdale for a weekend break in Northumberland. The pair try outdoor swimming and a laughter yoga session.

programme.title: Rick Steins Cornwall (S2)
programme.desc: In the town of Looe, Rick learns about a time when the Cornish were taken as slaves by North African pirates. He joins one of the last fishing boats in St Mawes and uses the catch of lemon sole to make a warm, delicious salad. In Newlyn, he meets two entrepreneur chefs who cook mackerel to perfection.

programme.title: Donal Skehan: Home Cook (S1)
programme.desc: Donal shares three of his favourite lazy weekend dishes, making slow-cooked butter chicken, a Sunday pork shoulder roast and a messy and delicious meringue swish to finish.

programme.title: Fiona and Andrew
programme.desc: Using virtual reality, two top architects compete to remodel Fiona and Andrews barn conversion in Solihull. Will they go for Julians contemporary design or Lauras incredible vistas?

programme.title: Malaysia Gourmet With Justine Schofield (S1)
programme.desc: Justine explores Malaysian street food as she travels from Kuching to Penang, tasting the diverse local flavours. She also cooks delicious sticky wings and uncovers chef Raphael Jay Peter Lees creative take on the classic risotto.

programme.title: Malaysia Gourmet With Justine Schofield (S1)
programme.desc: Justine travels to the Terengganu cultural village to experience the cultural heritage of Malaysia. She learns about interesting food and musical traditions before heading on a culinary adventure with chef Afiq Matkhir.

programme.title: Junior Bake Off (S7)
programme.desc: Its the final and theres a funfair theme. First up is a signature bake where the four remaining contestants have to make dessert jars and ice cream sandwiches. Then for a showstopper they have to make a funfair cake that brings all the fun of the fair to the table.

programme.title: Nigellas Cook, Eat, Repeat (S1)
programme.desc: Nigella indulges in a special Christmas edition with food from near and far, including Linzer cookies, pomegranate cocktails, smoked salmon on black bread and Norwegian pork ribs.

programme.title: Rebecca and Ralphs Bender
programme.desc: In Dorset, musicians Ralph and Dizzy live on a farm and run woodland workshops from a simple shelter made from hazel. They want to make the existing structure more attractive but Simon sets about designing a new build made with hazel harvested from the surrounding woodland.

programme.title: Its time for carnival
programme.desc: JoJo wants to celebrate the St Lucia carnival with Great Gran Gran, but its too far away to travel to! Instead, JoJo and Gran Gran have their own carnival in the garden!

programme.title: Baby Race
programme.desc: Mum reminisces about Bluey and Judo as babies. Bluey learnt to roll over first, but Judo was the first to crawl, so then it became a race to see who was going to walk first.

programme.title: Grandad
programme.desc: Grandad is supposed to be resting, but when Bluey and Bingo go to visit him, he makes a run for it with the kids and takes them on a madcap adventure into the bush.

programme.title: Christmas Swim

programme.title: The Radio Badge
programme.desc: The Squirrels decide to start their own radio show.

programme.title: The Cheese Badge
programme.desc: Duggee and the Squirrels go on a mission to contain an outbreak.

programme.desc: Duggee helps the Squirrels learn about all the things trees do for creatures around them.

programme.desc: When Grandmaster Glitch makes popcorn in Mount Etna, Italy, he blocks the volcano and endangers farms on its slopes.

programme.title: Orange

programme.title: Cereal Mountain
programme.desc: Chilli is determined to make it to the top of Cereal Mountain without the help of Supertato and his gadgets. Evil Pea tries to get there first by cheating.

programme.desc: The Supermarket is frozen over and Supertato, Carrot, Broccoli and Tomato practice for the boat race by using chopsticks for oars, but it doesnt go well as theyre out of sync with each other.

programme.title: Lullaby
programme.desc: During Tiddlytubbies Sleepybyes, RuRu is wide awake. Tinky Winky, Dipsy, Laa-Laa and Po take it in turns to sing him a lullaby.

programme.title: Nose
programme.desc: Dee encourages a friend to say nose and we go on a whirlwind word adventure! We see lots of different noses - funny noses, bunny noses, sniffy noses and even snoring noses!

programme.title: Downhill Racers
programme.desc: Its the annual go-kart race, and Zip has chosen the racecourse, but is worried it isnt as fun as the ones before, so he tries to make the racecourse more exciting.

programme.title: Tick Tock Messy
programme.desc: Messy goes to OKIDO to play with Zim and Zams new discovery, but will he and his friends get back from this adventure in time?

programme.title: Family Meeting
programme.desc: When Dads accused of fluffing in Blueys face as he climbed out of bed, hes put on trial with Mum as the judge, and Bluey and Bingo as witnesses. Bluey might also have to explain what she was doing there.

programme.title: Faceytalk
programme.desc: Bluey and Bingo love to video chat with Muffin and Socks so they can all draw pictures together. When Muffin wont give Socks a turn, the kids discover what happens when you hog.

programme.desc: The Squirrels can learn more about nature and wildlife if they follow five easy steps: watch carefully, stay at a distance, dont interfere, be patient and alert, and stay quiet.

programme.desc: The Squirrels are causing a bit too much mess in the clubhouse, so Duggee explains that they need to think more carefully about what they are doing.

programme.desc: The hungry Squirrels turn to Duggee when they arent sure what to eat. Fortunately, he has his cookbook The Clubhouse Kitchen: Tasty Bites for Hungry Squirrels.

programme.title: The Nature Badge
programme.desc: The Squirrels can learn more about nature and wildlife if they follow five easy steps: watch carefully, stay at a distance, dont interfere, be patient and alert, and stay quiet.

programme.title: The Dos and Donts Badge
programme.desc: The Squirrels are causing a bit too much mess in the clubhouse, so Duggee explains that they need to think more carefully about what they are doing.

programme.title: Tarbela Dam, Pakistan
programme.desc: When Grandmaster Glitch gets his hands on a G.O. Force, the forecast isnt good for the Tarbela Dam in Pakistan.

programme.title: The Parthenon, Greece
programme.desc: Inspired by his favourite action film, Grand Master Glitch plans to make a blockbuster of his own, but first he needs to find the right setting for an action adventure.

programme.title: Tickle Crabs
programme.desc: When Dad brings a pair of tenacious tickle crabs home from the beach, nowhere in the house is safe! His only hope of escaping their tickles is with help from his true love.

programme.title: The Show
programme.desc: When Bingo drops Mums breakfast-in-bed on the floor, shes convinced shes ruined her big day. But Bluey helps make amends by putting on a play of how Mum and Dad first met.

programme.title: Andy and the Fur Seal Pup
programme.desc: When Mr Hammond notices a fur seal pup wandering alone in a forest away from the ocean, its up to Andy to find out why.

programme.title: Wild Flower Meadow
programme.desc: Ranger Hamza and the Ramblers go on an eco quest to find out all about wild flower meadows.

programme.title: Pirate Stickers
programme.desc: Sandy and Seaweed have started collecting "Famous Pirates and Crew of the World" stickers only to discover theres one last rare sticker to find.

programme.title: The Family Photo Badge
programme.desc: The Squirrels learn that friends can be like an extended family.

programme.title: The Breakfast Badge
programme.desc: Tags feeling grumpy because he didnt eat his breakfast, uh-oh!

programme.title: The Opposites Badge
programme.desc: The Squirrels have fun learning what opposites are, with help from their animal friends!

programme.title: Amazon Rain Forest, South America
programme.desc: Glitch wants a picnic so he stops the rain in the rainforest, upsetting the tree frogs.

programme.title: The Northern Lights, Finland
programme.desc: Ubercorn is excited to see the Northern Lights, but Glitchs Grunge-Grimbler covers them with smoke.

programme.title: Thomas and the Royal Engine
programme.desc: An invitation from the Queen sends Thomas and the crew to London as they weave through delays and debacles while racing to a royal celebration.

programme.title: Sun Spots
programme.desc: Nora turns Nelly into a Sunflower.

programme.title: Dog Loves Snark
programme.desc: Dog and Pug meet a pirate captain on a desert island who is hunting the Snark.

programme.title: The Beautiful Game
programme.desc: Monty, Jimmy Jones and Stan are preparing to play a game of soccer, but when they realise they dont have the proper gear to play, Stan abandons the match, leaving Monty questioning whether you can only play a game if you have all the correct equipment.

programme.title: Its time for carnival
programme.desc: JoJo wants to celebrate the St Lucia carnival with Great Gran Gran, but its too far away to travel to! Instead, JoJo and Gran Gran have their own carnival in the garden!

programme.title: Baby Race
programme.desc: Mum reminisces about Bluey and Judo as babies. Bluey learnt to roll over first, but Judo was the first to crawl, so then it became a race to see who was going to walk first.

programme.title: Grandad
programme.desc: Grandad is supposed to be resting, but when Bluey and Bingo go to visit him, he makes a run for it with the kids and takes them on a madcap adventure into the bush.

programme.title: Christmas Swim
programme.desc: The Heelers gather for a classic Aussie Christmas. Bluey gets a new teddy and introduces him to the whole family, but the family play too rough with him and now he wants to go home.

programme.title: The Radio Badge
programme.desc: The Squirrels decide to start their own radio show.

programme.title: The Cheese Badge
programme.desc: Duggee and the Squirrels go on a mission to contain an outbreak.

programme.title: The Tree Badge
programme.desc: Duggee helps the Squirrels learn about all the things trees do for creatures around them.

programme.title: Mount Etna, Italy
programme.desc: When Grandmaster Glitch makes popcorn in Mount Etna, Italy, he blocks the volcano and endangers farms on its slopes.

programme.title: Corn
programme.desc: Live from the Roots and Fruits theatre, its Corn singing an A-maiz-ing Counting Song about his remarkably organised kernel rows.

programme.title: Orange
programme.desc: Live from the Roots and Fruits theatre, its the daring Orange attempting to cross the stage on a tightrope, if she manages to ignore any distractions.

programme.title: Cereal Mountain
programme.desc: Chilli is determined to make it to the top of Cereal Mountain without the help of Supertato and his gadgets. Evil Pea tries to get there first by cheating.

programme.title: Dragon Boat Beats
programme.desc: The Supermarket is frozen over and Supertato, Carrot, Broccoli and Tomato practice for the boat race by using chopsticks for oars, but it doesnt go well as theyre out of sync with each other.

programme.title: Listen
programme.desc: Tinky Winky, Dipsy, Laa-Laa and Po take it in turns to listen to music through a pair of headphones. The Teletubbies love dancing to the music they hear.

programme.title: Bird
programme.desc: Dee encourages a friend to say bird and we go on a whirlwind word adventure! We see lots of different birds including a swimming bird, a napping bird and even a rapping bird!

programme.title: Hooper Dooper Land
programme.desc: Hooper and Helping Hand are building an amazing theme park: Hooper Dooper Land! The attractions arent ready yet but the friends are so excited that Hooper decides to open the park early.

programme.title: Moon Landing
programme.desc: Messy accidentally drops his jam sandwich, but why did it fall down and not up? He goes to OKIDO and rockets up to the moon to find out.

programme.title: Ragdoll
programme.desc: Dad agrees to take Bluey and Bingo to the shops to buy an ice-cream if they can get him into the car. Only problem is... hes just entered Ragdoll mode!

programme.title: Bedroom
programme.desc: Chilli and Bandit transform the old nursery into a new bedroom for Bluey. In the process, Bluey and Bingo amicably divide their belongings, but get absorbed by trading items and swapping notes at bedtime. Ultimately, when Bluey misses her sister, she asks to return to her old room.

programme.desc: When the Squirrels tell Duggee that they have nothing left to play with, he encourages them to use their imagination.

programme.desc: The Squirrels are transported into the future where they encounter a robot Duggee!

programme.title: The Family Photo Badge
programme.desc: The Squirrels learn that friends can be like an extended family.

programme.title: The Breakfast Badge
programme.desc: Tags feeling grumpy because he didnt eat his breakfast, uh-oh!

programme.title: The Dead Sea, Middle East
programme.desc: The Go Jetters are relaxing by the Dead Sea when Grandmaster Glitch causes a catastrophe.

programme.title: Amazon Rain Forest, South America
programme.desc: Glitch wants a picnic so he stops the rain in the rainforest, upsetting the tree frogs.

programme.title: Free The Roads
programme.desc: Bulgy thinks that people should travel by bus instead of rail, that is until he tries carrying all their passengers.

programme.title: Hair Cut
programme.desc: Sarahs hair keeps getting in her way, so its time for a trip to the hairdressers.

programme.title: Basking Shark
programme.desc: Sarah is keen to adopt a sea creature, but doesnt get her first choice...

programme.title: Snow House
programme.desc: Nelly and Nora want to make an igloo but there just isnt enough snow.

programme.title: Dog Loves Monsters
programme.desc: Dog and Pug visit a spooky castle, where they meet a princess who has no friends.

programme.title: Matching Socks
programme.desc: When Monty cant find a pair of matching socks, he begins to wonder why things have to match at all.

programme.title: Its time to find a dinosaur
programme.desc: After playing with her toy dinosaurs, JoJo decides she would love to see a real one. Gran Gran takes JoJo to the museum to see a fossilised skeleton of a Tyrannosaurus rex!

programme.title: Grandad
programme.desc: Grandad is supposed to be resting, but when Bluey and Bingo go to visit him, he makes a run for it with the kids and takes them on a madcap adventure into the bush.

programme.title: Christmas Swim
programme.desc: The Heelers gather for a classic Aussie Christmas. Bluey gets a new teddy and introduces him to the whole family, but the family play too rough with him and now he wants to go home.

programme.title: Easter
programme.desc: Its the night before Easter and Bluey and Bingo are worried the Easter bunny is going to forget about them like last year.

programme.title: The Opposites Badge
programme.desc: The Squirrels have fun learning what opposites are, with help from their animal friends!

programme.title: The Radio Badge
programme.desc: The Squirrels decide to start their own radio show.

programme.title: The Cheese Badge
programme.desc: Duggee and the Squirrels go on a mission to contain an outbreak.

programme.title: Table Mountain, South Africa
programme.desc: Glitch wants to ski, so the Grimbots give Table Mountain a snowy peak, which threatens its rare plants.

programme.title: Plum
programme.desc: Live from the Roots and Fruits theatre, its Plum performing the Sugar Plum Fairy Bounce and attempting to do not one, not two, but three pirouettes in midair!

programme.title: Corn
programme.desc: Live from the Roots and Fruits theatre, its Corn singing an A-maiz-ing Counting Song about his remarkably organised kernel rows.

programme.title: Dragon Boat Beats
programme.desc: The Supermarket is frozen over and Supertato, Carrot, Broccoli and Tomato practice for the boat race by using chopsticks for oars, but it doesnt go well as theyre out of sync with each other.

programme.title: How to be a Supertato
programme.desc: Supertato shows the Grape Kids a Supertato training film, but Evil Pea sneaks in to take over Tato Tower. The Grape Kids use the rug launcher to eject Evil Pea out of the tower.

programme.title: Swap Places
programme.desc: The Teletubbies swap places in the Tubby Car and drive to the Hidey Hup. They swap places again on the Tubby Uppy Downy before going up and down.

programme.title: Bath
programme.desc: Dee encourages a friend to say bath and we go on a whirlwind word adventure! We see lots of different baths - a baby bath, a bubble bath, a bird bath and even a banana bath!

programme.title: The Floor is Bananas
programme.desc: Helping Hand builds a banana-themed obstacle course. But when Phoebe becomes competitive, she must work with her team to make it over the finish line together.

programme.title: Felix Finds His Voice
programme.desc: Messy, a monster, explores science questions that children ask about the world around us. Messy the monster hears a chirping songbird outside his window, but he cant understand what the bird is saying. He goes to OKIDO to find out why all things cant just simply talk the same.

programme.title: Bedroom
programme.desc: Chilli and Bandit transform the old nursery into a new bedroom for Bluey. In the process, Bluey and Bingo amicably divide their belongings, but get absorbed by trading items and swapping notes at bedtime. Ultimately, when Bluey misses her sister, she asks to return to her old room.

programme.title: Obstacle Course
programme.desc: Chilli sets up an obstacle course in the backyard, but Bluey is disheartened when Bandit turns it into a race and beats her. After cheating in a rematch, Bluey discovers the importance of training in order to improve her skills.

programme.title: The Getting Ready Badge
programme.desc: The Squirrels are getting ready for the same woodland adventure, but their mornings all look slightly different.

programme.title: The Imagination Badge
programme.desc: When the Squirrels tell Duggee that they have nothing left to play with, he encourages them to use their imagination.

programme.title: The Recipe Badge
programme.desc: The hungry Squirrels turn to Duggee when they arent sure what to eat. Fortunately, he has his cookbook The Clubhouse Kitchen: Tasty Bites for Hungry Squirrels.

programme.title: Caernarfon Castle, Wales
programme.desc: How will the Go Jetters retrieve Xulis treasured Academy Ace flying trophy from Caernarfon Castle?

programme.title: Mount Rushmore, USA
programme.desc: When the Grimbots add Glitchs face to those of the presidents on Mount Rushmore they cause a major mudslide.

programme.title: Bus
programme.desc: During a game of bus, passenger Mum is too shy to tell bus driver Dad that she secretly loves him, until she gets some help from the Grannies.

programme.title: Escape
programme.desc: When Mum and Dad describe a made-up world where they can relax without the girls, Bluey and Bingo decide to burst into their fantasy and chase them down. How will Mum and Dad escape?

programme.title: Andy and the Baby Alligators
programme.desc: When Andy inadvertently destroys an audio tape of a recording that Mr Hammond made of a baby alligator, its up to him to replace it.

programme.title: Woodlice
programme.desc: Ranger Hamza and the Ramblers go on an eco quest to find out all about woodlice.

programme.title: Sandcastle Squish
programme.desc: Seaweed arrives on deck playing a new game called Sandcastle Squish on his console, but Captain Captain takes it off him and quickly becomes obsessed with it, neglecting her captains duties. Its up to the pirates to try and get her to stop playing the game.

programme.title: The Philosophy Badge
programme.desc: The Squirrels think about lifes big questions, and gain their Philosophy badges.

programme.title: The Future Badge
programme.desc: The Squirrels are transported into the future where they encounter a robot Duggee!

programme.title: The Family Photo Badge

programme.title: Chucklesome Trucks
programme.desc: When Rebecca works with the Troublesome Trucks, everyone expects the worst, but she defies everyones expectations and has a very amusing day.

programme.title: Constable Quack
programme.desc: After their snacks go missing, Sergeant Sarah and Constable Quack are on the trail of a biscuit burglar.

programme.desc: Sarahs hair keeps getting in her way, so its time for a trip to the hairdressers.

programme.desc: Monty tries to get his family to play football with him, but they are all too busy doing flower-related activities.

programme.title: The Future Badge
programme.desc: The Squirrels are transported into the future where they encounter a robot Duggee!

programme.title: The Family Photo Badge
programme.desc: The Squirrels learn that friends can be like an extended family.

programme.title: The Forbidden City, China
programme.desc: Some runaway Chinese drums roll towards The Forbidden City. Can the Go Jetters stop them?

programme.title: The Dead Sea, Middle East
programme.desc: The Go Jetters are relaxing by the Dead Sea when Grandmaster Glitch causes a catastrophe.

programme.title: The Mirror and the Lichee
programme.desc: The curious title in this Huangmei Opera romance refers to the two props that signal a happy beginning between a scholar and a local beauty. The scholar polishes mirrors so as to be closer to his love, who signals her approval by tossing him some lichees. From that point on the course of their love becomes rocky, complete with murder and suicide.

programme.title: The King Boxer
programme.desc: This tale of a honorable fighters retraining in the "Iron Palm" style, that became the first international martial arts movie hit and made a continent-spanning star of Lo Lieh.

programme.title: Between Tears and Smiles
programme.desc: Fan Jia Shu is a kind-hearted student who is smitten with Shen, a heart-rending love song singer. However, he is not the only one who has eyes for Shen. The Generals henchmen are also determined to present the songstress to their superior as a gift. Fan receives help from an unexpected person just in time to save the woman he loves.

programme.title: The Long Chase
programme.desc: Governor Yan is killed and his guard Fan identifies Kou as the assassin by his signature weapon, a dart. Kou is listed as a wanted man when he enters the city, but managed to escape arrest with the help of the innkeepers daughter. At the same time, Fan is attacked by a bandit who pretends to be Kou. What are the secret plots behind these attacks?

programme.title: River of Tears
programme.desc: Retired singer Fang lives happily with her husband and son. Tragedy happens when a man from her past returns to haunt her. In an ensuing struggle to free her from his clutches, her husband dies in a car accident. Blamed by her father-in-law for her husbands death, Fang gets chased out of the house and goes back to singing to make a living...

programme.title: Descendant of the Sun
programme.desc: Shi Sheng is adopted by an old carpenter and grows up to possess extraordinary superpowers. One day, he unexpectedly discovers his identity as the son of the solar deity and learns that his power will be lost during solar eclipse. When an evil spirit appears and wreaks havoc, Shi Sheng must beat him in an ultimate duel to save the world.

programme.title: The Adventures of Emperor Chien Lung
programme.desc: Emperor Chien Lung travels incognito to Jiangnan to review his peoples livelihood but soon discovers that corrupt officials are oppressing his people. The emperor meets an upright young man and they join hands to teach the corrupt officials a lesson. The young man was appointed as his bodyguard thereafter.

programme.title: Heaven and Hell
programme.desc: When an angel, Ling, decides to help his two friends who have fallen in love to escape from Heaven, he is sent to live as a human on earth as his punishment. Reincarnated as a cab driver, he sacrifices his own life to save another ill-fated couple and lands in hell, where he has to face off against the ghosts and demons to fight his way out!

programme.title: Tiger Killer
programme.desc: Wu Song is appointed as chief constable after killing a tiger with his bare hands when drunk. The wife of his brother Wu Da Lang, seduces Wu Song but gets rejected by him, and engages in an affair with a rich man. They poison Wu Da Lang when he finds out about their affair. To avenge his brothers death, Wu Song kills both of them.

programme.title: Brothers from the Walled City
programme.desc: Two orphaned brothers growing up in Kowloons Walled City - the place where people are forced to live with indecent businesses of sex, gambling and drugs controlled by triads - take very different life paths. Chin works at a cabaret but keeps away from sins, while Kang is drawn to the sleazy underworld. Are their destinies shaped by the "walls"?

programme.title: The Devils Mirror
programme.desc: A power-hungry Witch who leads the Bloody Ghouls Clan, seeks two magical mirrors, Wind Mirror and Thunder Mirror, which are owned by Bai and the Wen Clan respectively. She needs both mirrors to find the location of a powerful weapon that will make her invincible and will stop at nothing to get her hands on them.

programme.title: The Invincible Fist
programme.desc: A dedicated chief constable nicknamed "The Invincible Fist" is chasing after a band of bandits near a village one day and encounters an innocent blind girl. He quickly falls in love with her, but finds out she is the daughter of a vicious bandit. Will he kill the father of his lover?

programme.title: Clan Of The White Lotus
programme.desc: The head of White Lotus Clan, Lo, is a highly skilled martial artist who supports the Qing government and helps destroy the rebellion group. Hung from Shaolin who kills Los brother, is being hunted and hides in another rebel Hus house. The clan attacks at night killing Hu and his sister, but Hung manages to get Hus pregnant wife to safety.

programme.title: Na Cha the Great
programme.desc: Adapted from a chapter of the classic Chinese legend "Investiture of the Gods

programme.title: Invincible Enforcer
programme.desc: A young man is at the wrong place at the wrong time. As he offends a police inspector, he is thrown into jail and even when released, the police goes after him until he has no choice but to become a real criminal. Only a kind and beautiful probation officer is on his side, but can she help him?

programme.title: Songfest
programme.desc: As its name implies, Songfest is an Eastmancolor-Shawscope costume musical, traditionally Chinese and timeless in content; yet revealing a spirited and modern technique. Shot on location at Taiwans beautiful Sun-Moon Lake, its a turbulent romance between a passionate tea picker Sung Yu Lan and a charming fisherman Li Chun Yang.

programme.title: The Pearl Phoenix
programme.desc: In Huangmei Opera tradition, this movie tells the love story of Wen, who sells himself as a slave to a rich family, and Huo, the familys young daughter. The lovers are kept apart by Huos stepmother and Huo escapes by dressing up as a man. Wen is framed and put into jail so Huo has to go back and rescue her lover!

programme.title: The Mad Monk
programme.desc: The movie consists of four stories of the Mad Monk helping others, from saving a mother and daughter from crumbling walls, to helping hawkers deal with bullies, recovering stolen money for a young man and punishing a devious court official and his son.

programme.title: Clan of Amazons
programme.desc: The martial arts world is plunged into terror when a mysterious figure known as the Embroidery Bandit starts to attack convoys of precious materials. Seemingly unstoppable, the frightened clans decide to call on the expertise of Lu Xiao Feng, an inquisitive fighter and detective to capture the culprit.

programme.title: A Place to Call Home
programme.desc: Li Ching, star of Sweet is Revenge, plays one of three daughters, whose life is turned upside down when she discovers she is adopted. But things get even worse when she goes in search of her real mother. Finally, after what is almost a double tragedy, she realizes what so many knew all along: Theres no place like home.

programme.title: The Trail of the Broken Blade
programme.desc: Chivalrous swordsman Fung goes in search of another swordsman on the run, Li Yue, in order to reunite him with his love. Though both men meet and end up being close friends, Li Yue did not reveal his true identity until Fungs life is endangered by a gang looking for revenge...

programme.title: Love Parade
programme.desc: Fashion designer Shi asks his friend Mui to comment on his new design but is angered by her criticism. When Mui asks him to design a gown for her to attend a gala event, Shi takes revenge by making a clown costume instead. Seeing Muis embarrassment, Shi feels guilty and apologizes to her, before they fall in love...

programme.title: Heaven Sword and Dragon Sabre
programme.desc: In the Yuan Dynasty, martial artists everywhere battle for the Heaven Sword and the Dragon Sabre, as only when these two powerful weapons combine can a secret be revealed to help one become the king of the martial arts world. As Zhang Wu Ji acquires the skills from "Nine Yang Scriptures" by chance, he is also embroiled in this lengthy battle.

programme.title: Raw Passions
programme.desc: Mrs Lins husband and his friend both have affairs with a belly dancer Sasa, and are both blackmailed by her. Sasa is stabbed one day and her brother shows up asking for money. A mysterious man also claims he can offer evidence for cash to help Lins husband. Lin has to unveil the deceit, double-crosses and blackmailing before she is in danger too!

programme.title: The Fantastic Magic Baby
programme.desc: The story is about the legendary Monkey King (Liu Chung-chun) teams up with Goddess of Mercy (Chao Li-chuan) and the Dragon Girl (Lung Nu) to battle the child god Hung Hai-erh (Ting Hua-chung),son of the Ox Demon (Hung Hai-erh) to rescue Tang Tseng, the Holy Pilgrim (Teng Chio-jen).

programme.title: Intimate Confessions of a Chinese Courtesan
programme.desc: Young Ai Nu is abducted and sold to the popular Four Seasons brothel run by the powerful and ruthless Madam Chun Yi. Ai Nu gets locked up in a dungeon due to her fiery attitude. Soon, a murder occurs within the brothel and a policeman must race against time to prevent a vicious revenge plot from reaching its blood-spattered conclusion.

programme.title: The Black Enforcer
programme.desc: Lung the Black Enforcer is ordered to escort a murderer Fei to prison. While taking shelter in Lungs house from the snowstorm, Fei is rescued by his gang and Fei kills Lungs mother and sister before escaping. Lung is imprisoned for the failed task and after being released, he vows to avenge his family by killing Fei.

programme.title: The Bloody Escape
programme.desc: Ku is a skilled Kung Fu artist brought up by the bandits and does not agree with the brutal leader of the bandits camp. He rescues Tong, a young lady forced to become the leaders wife, causing both the authorities and bandits to come after them. Ku has to stand up against the bandits that he grew up with so as to start a new life for himself.

programme.title: Life Gamble
programme.desc: Martial arts master Yu has retired for years but is invited to join force with another master Tao to fight against the four famous thieves and retrieve the stolen Dragon Jade. However, Taos real plan is to possess the treasure himself and kills Yu after he defeats the thieves...

programme.title: The Dream of the Red Chamber
programme.desc: Adapted from the great Chinese classic novel of the same name, the son of renowned Jia family, Bao Yu, is deeply in love with his cousin, Dai Yu. However, his mother disapproves of their relationship and plots to arrange Bao Yu to marry another rich girl, resulting in a tragic ending for the perfect couple.

programme.title: The Brave Archer 3
programme.desc: Guo Jing and Huang Rong go to Iron Palm Peak to search for the Book of Wumu. The chief of Iron Palm discovers their visit, and seriously injures Huang. It seems only the Southern Emperor Duan can heal her, but will Huang be healed in time?

programme.title: Love With The Perfect Stranger
programme.desc: After breaking up with his girlfriend, salesman Bao meets a rich girl, Jin Jin, who just broke up with her boyfriend. Two equally heartbroken strangers fall in love instantly and get married on impulse. The couple lives happily together until Jin Jin finds herself pregnant with her ex-boyfriends baby...

programme.title: The Golden Buddha
programme.desc: A map indicating the location of the Chans family heirloom is hidden in three Golden Buddha statues. Paul, an insurance agent, finds one statue by chance and Chans daughter has another one. This makes them targets of treasure-hunting criminals and they have to team up to defeat them before unveiling the hidden secrets.

programme.title: A Maid From Heaven
programme.desc: The seventh daughter of the Jade Emperor is banished from heaven to live a mortal life as she is very mischievous. She falls in love with a young village lad Yong, who sold himself to work for the rich so as to bury his father. The goddess sisters help Yong to pay his debt so the lovebirds can be together. Is this going to end happily-ever-after?

programme.title: Demon of the Lute
programme.desc: Lute demon Chin Mo has reappeared in the world to wreak havoc. Hsiao Feng Ling is ordered to help find a special bow and arrows that can counter the demon. Only Chiao Yin knows the whereabouts of the weapon. Hsiao and her classmate Old Naughty set out on an arduous journey to find Chiao. After overcoming many obstacles, they catch Chin Mos man trying to snatch the bow and manage to stop him in time....

programme.title: The 5 Billion Dollar Legacy
programme.desc: A crippled billionaire mails a letter to each of his long-lost daughters inviting them to go to Japan, in the hope that he will find a worthy heir to inherit his vast fortune. The sisters finally meet abroad the plane to Japan, and one of them is taken with a man who is going to investigate the death of his lawyer uncle in a mysterious hit-and-run.

programme.title: Love without End
programme.desc: In this classic romantic melodrama, nightclub songstress Qing Qing falls for the handsome Peng Nan. However, the two go through an emotional roller coaster of misunderstandings, separations and mutual torment. When the two finally fall back into love, Qing Qing receives a shocking revelation that brings the story to its inevitable sad ending.

programme.title: China News
programme.desc: China News focuses on the latest news and social changes happening in China as well as all over the world.

programme.title: Focus Today
programme.desc: Focus Today traces current affairs from China and the world.

programme.title: Love For All Seasons
programme.desc: May, acting leader of the Er Mei sect, cures the incurable illness of Tiger, a rich playboy. Under the threat of her senior, May seeks help from Tiger to experience heartbreak and master the "Heartbroken Sword" style, so as to defeat her senior and preserve Er Mei sect. Will this strange and long-winding relationship reach a happy ending?

programme.title: Winner Takes All
programme.desc: Two private detectives want to gain fame by solving a series of robberies. However, they were fooled by the King of Thieves during the investigation. It was later discovered that all the robberies were related to a Japanese businessman, Miyamoto. Who is the real King of Thieves?

programme.title: My School Mate, The Barbarian
programme.desc: Edward attends a new school which has a reputation for fighting. Student leader Stone, befriends Edward, but their friendship is tested when a local triad leader discovers that Edward comes from a wealthy family.

programme.title: Undercover Hidden Dragon
programme.desc: In this hilarious comedy, Fat is a gangster who suffers from amnesia. Believing that he is actually an undercover policeman, Fat attempts to arrest gang leader Big Bro, but instead becomes the gangsters best ally. To complicate matters further, a gangster named Wind, who looks exactly like Fat, starts a turf war with Big Bro.

programme.title: Winners and Sinners
programme.desc: Five good friends form a cleaning company after they are released from jail. The gangsters encounter a robber while trading banknote printing plate and as the police chases after the robber, he throws the plate into their cleaning cart. Hunted down by the two rival gangs for the plate, the five friends defend themselves with clever tricks.

programme.title: Love in a Fallen City
programme.desc: Based on a novel of the same name by the famous novelist Eileen Chang and directed by the equally acclaimed director Ann Hui, this romance story depicts the challenging relationship between an introverted Shanghai divorcee and a cynical Malaysian playboy during the Japanese invasion of Hong Kong in the 1940s. Will the lovers be together in the end?

programme.title: Bullet and Brain
programme.desc: Nine years ago, two legendary criminals, Bullet and Brain, vowed not to kill and lie before they disappeared. Both now return for a mission - to protect the granddaughter of the triad boss. Can they succeed without breaking their vows?

programme.title: Lets Make Laugh II
programme.desc: Bodyguard Ah Sun is sent to protect his boss son, only to meet and fall in love with his mistress, the gorgeous Joey. As love blossoms between the two, the powerful boss finds out and all hell breaks loose!

programme.title: Mr. Virgin
programme.desc: Mr. Virgin is a romantic comedy about a twenty-nine year-old man Chao Yu-ting (Alfred Chang) who has seemingly been cursed. He becomes paranoid when a Feng Shui expert tells him it will be unlucky for him to marry before the age of thirty... so comical chaos line the days up to his next birthday!

programme.title: In Laws, Out Laws
programme.desc: When priceless antiques were found in the backyard of Auntie Kangs home, the family finds themselves becoming sudden millionaires. Their arguments and disagreements lead to hilarious results as each of Auntie Kangs sons tries his darnedest to get the biggest shares!

programme.title: Maybe Its Love
programme.desc: A girl Marble witnesses a murder case and reports it to the police. After much investigation, the police can only sort out the complicated relationships between a rich merchants mistress, a postman, a shop owner and his wife, but find no clue as to who the murderer is. Therefore, Marble decides to carry out her own investigation...

programme.title: The Mad Monk
programme.desc: Stephen Chow plays an arrogant god in Heaven who is being punished for his pranks and mistakes. He is sent to Earth and reincarnate as Mad Monk to change the destiny of three misguided souls - a prostitute, a beggar and a villain. The Mad Monk needs to complete the task in three days in order to return to Heaven.

programme.title: Loving You
programme.desc: A bad-tempered, womanizing cop who always neglects his wife is shot in the head as he hunts down a drug dealer. Though he miraculously survives, he must depend on his wife to nurse him back to health. During the recovery, he begins to re-evaluate his life and repair the damages of his broken marriage.

programme.title: Hong Kong Hong Kong
programme.desc: After moving to Hong Kong, illegal immigrant Mang has no choice but to live in cramped quarters with male migrants who abuse her. In order to attain Hong Kong residency and a better life, she agrees to marry a lonely old carpenter. After her marriage, Mang crosses paths again with her ex-lover, and the two develop a passionate affair...

programme.title: Behind the Yellow Line
programme.desc: A fresh graduate, Paul, strikes up an acquaintance with a pretty young girl, Monica, on the metro. Monica is involved in a love affair with a married man while Paul is also pursued by a rich girl. When Paul vows his true love for Monica, she suggests playing hide-and-seek with him in the metro to decide if they are fated to be together.

programme.title: Kung Fu Mahjong 3
programme.desc: Gambling tycoon Man suddenly marries his new partner Sophie, which shocked his only son, Ken. In the wake of Mans heart attack, Ken must battle Sophie - who has persuaded Man to transfer his grand master title to her in the event of his death - for the rightful claim to the familys gambling business in a riveting game of mahjong.

programme.title: Doubles Cause Troubles
programme.desc: Two squabbling cousins find themselves in more trouble than they can imagine after their tenant ends up dead. The gangsters and the police are both after them, and they have no idea what they have done wrong!

programme.title: Destinys Champion
programme.desc: An aging fighter relives the mistakes of his violent past through a poor and streetwise kid, who severely injures his nemesis during a battle to win a girls heart.

programme.title: Everyday Is Valentine
programme.desc: OK is a serial liar who constantly bends the truth to get his way. One day, he meets his dream girl, Wonderful and pretends to be a rich man in order to win her heart. However, Wonderful has sworn that she will never love a man who lies. Can OK stop lying and win his dream girls heart?

programme.title: Sound of Colors
programme.desc: Lonesome marriage consultant Ming meets a blind but charming young lady, Yeuk, at a subway station. When Ming suddenly turns blind too, Yeuk helps him navigate through his world of darkness, and they begin to fall in love. This feature is based on the illustrated book from famous Taiwan illustrator Jimmy Liao.

programme.title: Armour of God
programme.desc: Jackie, the Asian Hawk, steals treasures from remote places and resells them at a good price. He finds the mysterious and legendary "Armour of God" and sells it to the Earl. When terrorists kidnap his ex-girlfriend Laura in exchange for the "Armour of God

programme.title: Dry Wood Fierce Fire
programme.desc: Alice works for a womens magazine and falls for Ryan, who is hired to run the mens magazine, both owned by magazine tycoon Michelle. Ryan only has eyes for Michelle and Alice tries to hide her true feelings to help him win Michelle.

programme.title: Shark Busters
programme.desc: During the financial crisis, a vast majority of Hong Kong people experience difficulties in repaying debts. During this time, loan sharks use ruthless ways to force debtors to repay their loans and it is up to Officer Lee and his underground team to hunt down the head of this illegal organization.

programme.title: Iron Monkey
programme.desc: Dr Yang leads a secret life as Iron Monkey, stealing from the rich and giving it to the poor. Unable to arrest Iron Monkey, the officials force martial arts master Wong Kei Ying to find the masked thief by detaining his son Wong Fei Hung. However, after witnessing the corruption in the government, Kei Ying decides to join Iron Monkey to fight back.

programme.title: How to Pick Girls Up !
programme.desc: Xin, a helpless loser in love, calls in to a radio show hosted by DJ Tsang to ask desperately for help. A self-proclaimed love expert, Tsang takes it upon himself to make sure Xin meets girls and leads him on a series of absurd excursions into the wild and dangerous world of modern love.

programme.title: Romantic Dream
programme.desc: Dino meets his dream girl Mandy and falls in love with her at first sight. However, she disappears suddenly and he only sees her again after nine years, when she is already married. To overcome the pain of losing his love, Dino finds a guru with supernatural power to make him meet Mandy in his dream.

programme.title: My Wife is 18
programme.desc: Cheung, a dull thirty-year-old man, gets married in the UK to lovely YoYo, who is just eighteen, so as to fulfil their parents wishes. Back in Hong Kong, their relationship is that of an assumed couple, as well as a teacher and student. With contradictions and funny incidents governing their relationship, the two gradually fall in love...

programme.title: Face to Face
programme.desc: Tamotsu dies in a skiing accident and his roommate Yoshio marries his wife as well as inherits his entire fortune. At Tamotsus funeral, Yoshio sees a badly disfigured old man and that is only the beginning of an evil downfall for him...

programme.title: My Darling Genie
programme.desc: A genie who is trapped in a Chinese oil umbrella helps an honorable young man and his uncle to deal with a covetous loan shark.

programme.title: Love and Let Love!
programme.desc: Cliff proposes to his girlfriend Terry but is killed in a car accident before she says "yes". Terry is devastated and inconsolable. When Cliffs ghost returns, they seem to go back to their good old days. However, Cliff is determined to help Terry get over his death and start anew.

programme.title: Midnight Fly
programme.desc: With her marriage in crisis, Michele takes off to Europe for a vacation and meets a Japanese woman named Miki. As they become friends and travel together, Michele discovers that Miki is her husbands mistress. When Miki goes missing in Morocco, Michele does everything she can to find her but ends up paying a heavy price...

programme.title: Those Were the Days
programme.desc: Director Wong despises Cantonese movies of the 60s, but accidentally travels back in time to that movie set. He meets Director Chu, who tells him he can return to modern time if someone likes the film he makes. Wong meets four classic movie stars and invites them to star in his new film, but it flops unexpectedly. Can Wong return to the present?

programme.title: Law Or Justice
programme.desc: Lawyer Yip defends a rapist and gets him acquitted. Yips boyfriend Fong, a police inspector, knows he is guilty and despises Yip for not upholding justice. The victims sister takes revenge by spiking the rapists drink but is raped instead. This puts the rapist back in court. Will Yip choose to uphold law or justice this time?

programme.title: Feel 100% 2003
programme.desc: Based on the popular comic book of the same name, Jerry and Lok are two best buddies with a common goal of finding their perfect girlfriend. Neither of them has ever encountered anything close to their "100% girl

programme.title: God of Gamblers Return
programme.desc: The God of Gamblers, Gao Jin, quits gambling and live a quiet life with his wife. However, a Taiwanese crime boss wants to become the new God of Gamblers and get rid of him, so he kills Gao Jins pregnant wife to force him to the casino table. Gao Jin is indignant and vows to fight the crime boss to avenge his wifes death.

programme.title: July Rhapsody
programme.desc: A 40-year-old high school teacher is in midlife crisis. His marriage is on the rocks and he is involved in a taboo romance with a female student who has a crush on him. Meanwhile, his wife is off to care for her dying ex-lover who shares a complicated history with the couple...

programme.title: Frugal Game
programme.desc: How do you overcome unemployment, divorce and crippling debt? Diana and Wai start a fake family to join a frugal game show on TV. To stimulate ratings, the producer forces the director, Tsui, to twist the game from an encouraging environment to a torturing one. As the fake family gets close to the prize, Tsui comes up with some bad ideas...

programme.title: Wonder Women
programme.desc: This is the story about a career woman and her friend going through life with their resilience and perseverance during the highs and lows of the Hong Kong economy over a decade, from the Handover in 1997 through 2007.

programme.title: Global Business
programme.desc: The flagship business program of CGTN’s English language service. The program offers in-depth analysis of the latest economic data, business trends and market moving policies, zooming in on how all this affects ordinary people. With separate editions out of Asia, Europe, Africa and the Americas, Global Business features analysts and news-makers supported through a global network of correspondents. Global Business shows you whats moving markets in both developed and emerging economies.

programme.title: The World Today
programme.desc: The core rolling news service of CGTN, with regular updates from Beijing, Washington, Nairobi and London, keep viewers up-to-date with all the world’s top stories as they happen. The World Today delivers breaking news, live events, in-depth reporting, expert analysis and sustained coverage.

programme.title: China 24
programme.desc: China 24 is a prime time news program featuring in-depth reports and analysis of the stories in the headlines in China. Produced by CGTN’s studios in Beijing and Washington D.C., the show takes a compelling and comprehensive look at China. It explores the country’s business, politics, technology, culture, entertainment and more. China 24 tackles head-on the issues that matter most to the nation and its people, with topical reports highlighting challenges facing this fast-changing country.

programme.title: The World Today
programme.desc: The core rolling news service of CGTN, with regular updates from Beijing, Washington, Nairobi and London, keep viewers up-to-date with all the world’s top stories as they happen. The World Today delivers breaking news, live events, in-depth reporting, expert analysis and sustained coverage.

programme.title: World Insight with Tian Wei
programme.desc: World Insight with Tian Wei is a long-running international platform for debate and intelligent discussion. It is the meeting point of both the highly influential and rising voices, facilitated by host, Tian Wei. Every Monday to Friday, it provides nutrition to form your own thoughts and ideas through live debate and interviews. Live debates linking movers and shakers take place in the signature segment "Global Debate".

programme.title: The World Today
programme.desc: The core rolling news service of CGTN, with regular updates from Beijing, Washington, Nairobi and London, keep viewers up-to-date with all the world’s top stories as they happen. The World Today delivers breaking news, live events, in-depth reporting, expert analysis and sustained coverage.

programme.title: Sports Scene
programme.desc: Sports Scene brings you closer to all the action from all corners of the world, with highlights from across Europe, North America and Chinas top sports leagues. We examine the changes and growth in Chinas domestic leagues, as the country undergoes an incredible economic transformation.

programme.title: The Hub With Wang Guan
programme.desc: The Hub with Wang Guan covers hot-button geopolitical and economic issues, as well as interesting stories and trends in culture, education, technology and lifestyle. It aims to connect people, cultures and societies across the East and the West. The program features dynamic designs, fast pace and rich visuals to keep viewers engaged. It also makes use of trending topics online, while focusing on what’s relevant in China and the world.

programme.title: Global Watch
programme.desc: GLOBAL WATCH is a 60 minute-long news program. The show stresses Chinese elements, emphasizing China’s perspective, policies and stories. The program, relying on global reporting resources, presents in-depth analysis and coverage of major global issues, from a Chinese perspective on international affairs. The program presents to-the-point interpretation of Chinese policies and stories that are of interest to foreign audiences, in a style they are familiar with.

programme.title: Rediscovering China
programme.desc: Rediscovering China is a half-hour documentary program on CGTN. Each edition offers unique insight into various aspects of life in China today. programme.title: Episode 2: Wig Of Hope(English/Chinese Subtitles)
programme.desc: More than 30,000 strands of hair weigh less than 150 grams but suffice for a wig that makes a difference. Students are driving a public donation of hair to gift wigs to cancer patients, to alleviate worries over chemotherapy which caused hair loss. Its up to Ah Mui and Ah Kam from Singapores last wigmaker to work their magic, put together fabulous, realistic wigs, and restore the patients confidence.

programme.title: (PG)Episode 4(English/Chinese Subtitles)
programme.desc: Yan and Kai pursue Agatha, always one step behind a taunting, mysterious man. Despite their efforts, theyre caught in a cycle of setbacks. "Closing Bell: Overtime" takes you through all of the after-hours moves including breaking news, corporate earnings and post-market trading. Big investors, smart strategists and top money managers debate actionable ideas and the big market themes of the day, and get viewers ready for tomorrows trading day.

programme.title: Shiva Shakthi Thiruvilayadal
programme.desc: Lord Shiva and his wife, Goddess Parvati, navigate their relationship and duties and offer sacrifices and brave separation to selflessly care for humanity.

programme.title: Mohini Aatam Arambam
programme.desc: In an attempt to gain eternal beauty, Nishanthi searches for 16 different ornaments to achieve her goal. However, to find these objects she must sacrifice the husband of every beautiful woman around.

programme.title: Vaanavil
programme.desc: Everyone discriminates against Surbhis sister, Soumya, for being intersex except their mother. Even Surabhi stands up for her sister when the times are tough.

programme.title: Alaipayuthey
programme.desc: Zain and Aliya are two headstrong individuals who cannot see eye to eye on anything. However, after spending time with each other, they fall in love and want to stay together.

programme.title: Bhaskar The Rascal
programme.desc: Aadi and Shivani are the children of single parents and wish to enjoy the happiness of a complete family. To achieve this, they try to bring their parents together.

programme.title: Shiva Shakthi Thiruvilayadal
programme.desc: Lord Shiva and his wife, Goddess Parvati, navigate their relationship and duties and offer sacrifices and brave separation to selflessly care for humanity.

programme.title: Vetri Vinayakar
programme.desc: When Lord Shiva beheads Ganesha, unaware that he is his son, Goddess Parvati asks Shiva to resurrect him. Later, Ganesha emerges as one of the most worshipped deities in the Hindu pantheon.

programme.title: Saakshyam
programme.desc: A gang of thugs commit mass murder and are sure that they escaped it without facing any consequences. However, they are unaware that a toddler has managed to escape their heinous crime.

programme.title: Sangadam Theerkum Saneeswaran
programme.desc: Sandhya, Indradev and Rahu come to learn of an unknown weapon that can spell doom for Shani and search for it. However, unknown to them, Mahadev had entrusted the weapon with Vishwakarma.

programme.title: Shiva Shakthi Thiruvilayadal
programme.desc: Lord Shiva and his wife, Goddess Parvati, navigate their relationship and duties and offer sacrifices and brave separation to selflessly care for humanity.

programme.title: Vetri Vinayakar
programme.desc: When Lord Shiva beheads Ganesha, unaware that he is his son, Goddess Parvati asks Shiva to resurrect him. Later, Ganesha emerges as one of the most worshipped deities in the Hindu pantheon.

programme.title: Nalanum Nandhiniyum
programme.desc: Childhood friends Nalan and Nandhini fall in love and get married despite the feud between their families. However, they hope to end the mutual animosity and live happily after they move to Chennai.

programme.title: Sangadam Theerkum Saneeswaran
programme.desc: The force behind Shanis weakness takes the form of a woman, Neelima, and escapes from Suryalok. After finding out about Neelima, Shani starts training to face her as Vishwakarma.

programme.title: Mohini Aatam Arambam
programme.desc: In an attempt to gain eternal beauty, Nishanthi searches for 16 different ornaments to achieve her goal. However, to find these objects she must sacrifice the husband of every beautiful woman around.

programme.title: Vaanavil
programme.desc: Everyone discriminates against Surbhis sister, Soumya, for being intersex except their mother. Even Surabhi stands up for her sister when the times are tough.

programme.title: Alaipayuthey
programme.desc: Zain and Aliya are two headstrong individuals who cannot see eye to eye on anything. However, after spending time with each other, they fall in love and want to stay together.

programme.title: Oru Yamannin Kaadhal Kadhai
programme.desc: A carefree person who enjoys hanging out with friends embarks on a quest for true love. One day, he stumbles upon a photo in a newspaper of a missing woman and falls in love with her.

programme.title: Court Cam: Top 10 Moments Of 2021
programme.desc: A countdown of the top 10 moments of 2021 on Court Cam.

programme.title: Something In The Water
programme.desc: A young womans body parts are found in a suspects plumbing and freezer and when hes brought into the interrogation room, his bizarre behaviour stuns even the most seasoned detectives.

programme.title: Devastation In Delta Township
programme.desc: Murders are rare in tranquil Delta Township. So when a well-liked couple is gunned down in their home, residents are terrified - until police discover the monster accidentally left a trail of breadcrumbs.

programme.title: Eyes Of A Killer
programme.desc: In February 2010, two gunmen shoot Michael Temple Jr, rendering him quadriplegic for the five years before his death. In this unusual cold case, DNA from a knife is used to create a sketch of the killer.

programme.title: Linda Carty
programme.desc: Linda Carty was sentenced to death on February 19, 2001 for the kidnapping of three-day-old newborn Ray Cabrera, and the kidnapping and murder of his mother, Joana Rodriguez.

programme.title: Eric Campbell
programme.desc: A shootout with police in West Virginia leads to the arrest of a 23-year-old Texas man, who is charged with savagely killing an elderly couple, robbing them and burning down their home.

programme.title: Night Shift
programme.desc: 18-year-old Kyle Farishian is working the late shift on Halloween when he is brutally attacked by a masked assailant. Surveillance footage helps detectives track down the culprit.

programme.title: Barking Up The Wrong Tree
programme.desc: In Modesto, two men struggle with high bail amounts, and a frequent flyer ends up back in jail after having a little too much boxed wine.

programme.title: No Bond, No Problem
programme.desc: Young adults learn the hard way that their actions have consequences. Three young men exploring abandoned buildings get charged with felony burglary.

programme.title: Court Cam: Top 10 Moments Of 2021
programme.desc: A countdown of the top 10 moments of 2021 on Court Cam.

programme.title: Victim Or Accomplice?
programme.desc: Authorities question a woman who travelled with serial killer about whether she was a victim or an accomplice. Plus, a bone-chilling confession from a man who freely admits to killing a college student.

programme.title: Robert Hansen: The Butcher Baker
programme.desc: Before he hunted down his first victim in the wilds of Alaska, Robert Hansen was working at his fathers bakery in a small town in Iowa, slowly developing an animosity towards women.

programme.title: Curtain Call To Hell
programme.desc: Stephanie and Daniel are young, in love, and happily balancing work and play. But before long, tensions are set off by disappointment, self-loathing, and a mutual affection for the bottle.

programme.title: Never Going Back
programme.desc: Carlos learns why he was removed from the program early. Darius struggles to keep peace in the pod. The serenity within the womens pod is shattered when a minor argument takes a violent turn.

programme.title: Naked ATV
programme.desc: A look at some of the strangest arrests from across the country. A naked man allegedly steals an ATV; a man who apparently was feeding the alligators gets a visit from police; and more.

programme.title: Drunk Horse and Buggy
programme.desc: A man proposes to his girlfriend while getting arrested; an aquarium worker helps catch a shark thief; a horse and buggy turns dangerous when a drunk man is operating it; and more.

programme.title: Beyond the Headlines: The Elizabeth Thomas Story with Elizabeth Smart
programme.desc: Five years after she was groomed and abducted by the most popular teacher in school, Elizabeth Thomas shares new revelations about her ordeal, with famed kidnapping survivor Elizabeth Smart.

programme.title: Stabbed My Neighbor Or Protected Myself?
programme.desc: Neighbourhood drinks turn bloody when a fight breaks out between friends. Was it self-defence or a brutal attack?

programme.title: Who Left The Seat Up?
programme.desc: A raised toilet seat alerts Kate Flory to an intruder that sends her screaming to the streets. When Samuel Bryan finds blood and muddy footprints, he and his father track down a looming phrogger.

programme.title: Women Who Kill - Georgina Henshaw
programme.desc: Chef Philip Rolph was besotted with waitress Georgina Henshaw. But Phil realised she was using him for his money, and Georgina bragged to a friend that she was planning to kill him.
