programme.desc: Before he hunted down his first victim in the wilds of Alaska, Robert Hansen was working at his fathers bakery in a small town in Iowa, slowly developing an animosity towards women.

programme.title: Curtain Call To Hell
programme.desc: Stephanie and Daniel are young, in love, and happily balancing work and play. But before long, tensions are set off by disappointment, self-loathing, and a mutual affection for the bottle.

programme.title: Beyond the Headlines: The Elizabeth Thomas Story with Elizabeth Smart
programme.desc: Five years after she was groomed and abducted by the most popular teacher in school, Elizabeth Thomas shares new revelations about her ordeal, with famed kidnapping survivor Elizabeth Smart.

programme.title: Stabbed My Neighbor Or Protected Myself?
programme.desc: Neighbourhood drinks turn bloody when a fight breaks out between friends. Was it self-defence or a brutal attack?

programme.title: Who Left The Seat Up?
programme.desc: A raised toilet seat alerts Kate Flory to an intruder that sends her screaming to the streets. When Samuel Bryan finds blood and muddy footprints, he and his father track down a looming phrogger.

programme.title: Never Going Back
programme.desc: Carlos learns why he was removed from the program early. Darius struggles to keep peace in the pod. The serenity within the womens pod is shattered when a minor argument takes a violent turn.

programme.title: Naked ATV
programme.desc: A look at some of the strangest arrests from across the country. A naked man allegedly steals an ATV; a man who apparently was feeding the alligators gets a visit from police; and more.

programme.title: Drunk Horse and Buggy
programme.desc: A man proposes to his girlfriend while getting arrested; an aquarium worker helps catch a shark thief; a horse and buggy turns dangerous when a drunk man is operating it; and more.

programme.title: Women Who Kill - Georgina Henshaw
programme.desc: Chef Philip Rolph was besotted with waitress Georgina Henshaw. But Phil realised she was using him for his money, and Georgina bragged to a friend that she was planning to kill him.

programme.title: The Cigarette Break
programme.desc: A young man accused of killing a beloved 52-year-old woman changes his tune after a cigarette break and DNA technology helps detectives solve a decades-old murder mystery.

programme.title: Elizabeth Shoaf
programme.desc: In 2006, Elizabeth Shoaf was abducted near her rural South Carolina home. The teenager was missing for over a week when a text message came through that brought hope to the case.

programme.title: Lured
programme.desc: Several survivors detail the story of Jeffrey Epstein, the mysterious billionaire who lured them to his home through an elaborate series of female recruiters they thought they could trust.
A look at some of the wildest courtroom moments: an armed robbery suspect escapes from the courthouse; a woman makes a virtual court appearance from her shower.
A look at some of the wildest courtroom moments: a mother asks the judge to sterilise her murderous daughter; a French tourist is in trouble for writing bad checks.

programme.title: Unfinished Business 2
programme.desc: A man is gunned down in broad daylight and detectives learn it could be connected to another homicide. A teenage girl is lured to her death by someone she considered a friend.

programme.title: Cruel Intentions
programme.desc: A woman in a volatile relationship is found dead in her car. Detectives suspect her boyfriend, but, at trial, he takes the stand to brazenly claim she was actually the victim of a drug deal gone bad.

programme.title: After The 60 Days: Part One
programme.desc: After the remaining participant leaves the program, the sheriff and her staff process how to implement the feedback as the inmates continue serving their time.

programme.title: I Dont Know What To Do
programme.desc: A Florida woman hides in her bathroom when a strange man breaks into her home in the middle of the night. A man trapped in his overturned truck calls 911 in a panic as the vehicle fills with icy water.

programme.desc: Could religious occurrences around the world be proof of miracles? A man in Hawaii trespasses on government property and witnesses UFOs, plus more paranormal footage you have to see to believe.

programme.title: A Watery Grave
programme.desc: Jeff and Jeannine Glanda have a picture-perfect family until selfishness and a shameless affair mark the beginning of the end. Money troubles and the threat of divorce breed paranoia and hate.
A typical Sunday morphs into a violent gunfight when two armed men invade a familys home; an unsuspecting impound lot worker checks out a disturbance and is nearly mowed down by an irate woman.

programme.title: Ice Cold In Denver
programme.desc: On a bitter morning in 1980, radio intern Helene Pruszynski is found brutalised. After 37 years, investigators tap into a public genealogy website that leads them to the killer theyve been hunting.

programme.title: Eyes Of A Killer
programme.desc: In February 2010, two gunmen shoot Michael Temple Jr, rendering him quadriplegic for the five years before his death. In this unusual cold case, DNA from a knife is used to create a sketch of the killer.

programme.title: Wade and Alexis
programme.desc: Wade is addicted to gaming. With no job and no income, he is on the verge of eviction. Alexis, 21, has been a cell phone junkie ever since she got her first phone at nine years old.

programme.title: The Battle of Tianshang Part 2
programme.desc: There is more epic action and intrigue as Po and the Dragon Knights continue their quest to destroy the Tianshang weapons, but find themselves in treacherous waters when they are captured by pirates, one of which is out for revenge against Mr. Ping! The adventures lead them to London, where they are wanted by the Knights. Old enemies resurface and Blade will have to face one of her most challenging opponents-her mom.

programme.title: The Stroll
programme.desc: Tina and Boss adjust to co-boss responsibilities while on a mission to rescue the baby with the best hair in the world from a lice outbreak. With opposing leadership views, the two split the existing field teams focus and discover a new archenemy in Lumpy the Park Duck.

programme.title: Midnight Scrum
programme.desc: When Viggo puts a bounty on Hiccups head, every Dragon Hunter in the world is after capturing Hiccup, so Toothless and the Riders must rescue him.

programme.title: Who Arted?
programme.desc: King Julien is crazy with jealousy and throws out the kingdoms art after he is upstaged by Mort who is now the towns hottest new artist

programme.title: Hot, Hot, Hot
programme.desc: Aggro is embarrassed about big changes shes going through. And when she gets stuck in a volcano, the Rescue Riders seek help from ... Magnus?

programme.title: Tree Troubles / Missing Pieces
programme.desc: When Marcus brings home the class tree sapling for the weekend, the Dew Drops see it starting to wilt and must cheer the sapling up, so Marcus can make sure to plant it for his class. / When Athena accidentally breaks Lolas nature sculpture, the Dew Drops must go on a scavenger hunt to replace the missing pieces.

programme.title: Tacos / Rainy Day
programme.desc: When Kelp is introduced to crunchy tacos in Unicorn Land, he must use his bubble sparks to bring them back to his family underwater. / Kelp’s unicorn friends are going to teach him Swishbee on land. But it rains and the game is called off until Kelp shows them that playing in the water can be even more fun.

programme.title: It Takes a Zenko / What a Racket
programme.desc: When various townsfolk report having lost soft belongings, TZG secretly investigates to discover thieving pigeon Yolanda had been building a nest for baby gophers. / When Ian’s lucky badminton racket goes missing, TZG secretly finds and returns it in time for a rematch against his toughest opponent.

programme.title: Tough Cookies / More Than Meets the Tie
programme.desc: Tags scooter breaks down during a Race Cadet challenge to deliver boxes of Sam Whippet’s Chocolate Chippet’s the fastest. So Tag and Scooch must rely on other ways of getting around town. / Muttfield the Magnificent is set to perform a magic show at Yip’s birthday party! Until he accidentally makes himself disappear. Muttfield instructs Tag and Scooch to retrieve three magical items to make him appear again. But can they do it in time?

programme.title: Hot, Hot, Hot
programme.desc: When a mama Ironclaw dragon gets caught high on a mountain with a broken wing, Hannahr the blacksmith has to confront her fear of heights to help out.

programme.title: The Ticket Trail / Flying Solo
programme.desc: Lola, Dylan and Cassie have tickets to the carnival, but when Dylan loses his ticket, the Dew Drops set out to find it. / When Phoebe accidentally gets tossed into Nicholas diaper bag before a trip to the park, Phoebe has to help a baby bird, while Eden and Athena must help Marcus rehearse for his big concert.

programme.title: Tacos / Rainy Day
programme.desc: When Kelp is introduced to crunchy tacos in Unicorn Land, he must use his bubble sparks to bring them back to his family underwater. / Kelp’s unicorn friends are going to teach him Swishbee on land. But it rains and the game is called off until Kelp shows them that playing in the water can be even more fun.

programme.title: Desert
programme.desc: Under orders from D-Structs, Scrappit steals one of Garbys parts, leading the Dinotrux on a trek through the desert to find help for their friend.

programme.title: Tortools
programme.desc: The Dinotrux find a nest of Tortool eggs. The hatchlings think Dozer is their mother and proceed to wreak havoc, painting everything in sight.

programme.title: Captain Underpants and the Tenuous Takedown of the Tyrannical Teachertrons
programme.desc: In the season opener, George and Harold have returned to school due to a technicality, but the school has been taken over by Melvin and a cyborg Melvin from the future! Their goal is to make the school extremely difficult by replacing all the teachers with Teachertron robots. Suffering under the new regime and without Mr. Krupp/Captain Underpants on hand to help, the boys hypnotize gym teacher Mr. Meaner and turn him into Sergeant Boxers to fight back.

programme.title: Captain Underpants and the Frantic Fury of the Fearsome Furculees
programme.desc: Tired of the Melvins ruling the school, the boys realize that they need Mr. Krupp to make the school at least bearable. Unfortunately, Krupp has run off to Ecuador to look for a fabled fountain. So the boys form the M.I.S.F.A.R.T.S. - Mega Incredible Search Force Adventure Rescue Team Squad - to travel to Ecuador and bring Krupp back, whether he wants it or not.

programme.title: Tacos / Rainy Day
programme.desc: When Kelp is introduced to crunchy tacos in Unicorn Land, he must use his bubble sparks to bring them back to his family underwater. / Kelp’s unicorn friends are going to teach him Swishbee on land. But it rains and the game is called off until Kelp shows them that playing in the water can be even more fun.

programme.title: The Ticket Trail / Flying Solo
programme.desc: Lola, Dylan and Cassie have tickets to the carnival, but when Dylan loses his ticket, the Dew Drops set out to find it. / When Phoebe accidentally gets tossed into Nicholas diaper bag before a trip to the park, Phoebe has to help a baby bird, while Eden and Athena must help Marcus rehearse for his big concert.

programme.title: Angerdome / Tush Twins
programme.desc: Tip battles an alien as angry as she is at the Boovs Angerspringa festival./Sharzod and Lucy become besties and call themselves the "Tush Twins."

programme.title: Sitting On Babies / Best Frenemies
programme.desc: Things go very wrong when Tip and Oh watch the Gorg babies at a cheese-themed playland/Captain Smek pretends to be Ohs friend just to ruin his day.

programme.title: Lucky and the No-Good Outlaw Butch Lepray
programme.desc: Lucky gets into trouble when the circus picks up a stranded woman who isnt what she seems

programme.title: Lucky and the Big Goodbye
programme.desc: While Lucky attempts to win over a town that is unwelcoming to the circus, she starts to question her own reasoning to stay

programme.title: Lucky and the Two-Wheeled Terror
programme.desc: When Lucky and the PALs arrive home from the circus, they find that Maricela and her new bicycle have become the star attraction in Miradero

programme.title: Imaginary Friends
programme.desc: After Boss insults Tinas imaginary friend, hes forced into "Imaginary Friend Sensitivity Training" at Baby Corp. Boss makes up his own imaginary friend to get out of these meetings, but after Tina gets a whiff that he may be lying, hes forced to keep up the charade at work and at home.

programme.title: Turf War
programme.desc: Its a turf war when Bounce House Bruiser Baby encroaches on Delivery Babys tricycle park! Tina attempts to befriend Bruiser in order to woo her back to the bounce house, but naughty behavior is the only language Bruiser understands. Determined to win this kid over, Tina ends up going rogue as a trike hoodlum, and her own field team is forced to reign her in.

programme.title: Trading Up
programme.desc: Boss takes an overdue vacation day, and ends up teaching Tabitha the value of "trading up" valueless objects into something she actually wants, an electric scooter. However, a 5%er baby is in trouble and BBs field team has "got it under control"… or do they? Boss tries to juggle his Tabitha lessons with sneaking peeks at the mission in progress

programme.title: The Poison Ravine
programme.desc: There is more epic action and intrigue as Po and the Dragon Knights continue their quest to destroy the Tianshang weapons, but find themselves in treacherous waters when they are captured by pirates, one of which is out for revenge against Mr. Ping! The adventures lead them to London, where they are wanted by the Knights. Old enemies resurface and Blade will have to face one of her most challenging opponents-her mom.

programme.title: In Dragons We Trust
programme.desc: After the dragons of Berk are blamed for an outbreak of crime, Hiccup is determined to find out what’s really going on before the dragons are exiled.

programme.title: Alvin and the Outcasts
programme.desc: Alvin and the outcast Vikings terrorize Berk, left defenseless without their dragons, and now only Hiccup can bring them back.

programme.title: Save The Cat
programme.desc: The search continues as Puss, Dulcinea, Artephius and Toby must complete task after task to gather the San Lorenzans and defeat the thieves who have a dangerous plan for the

programme.title: No Bark, All Bite
programme.desc: Hiccup and Stoick set forth to find willow bark while Gobber holds a cookoff for the merchants until things go a riot and the riders have to protect Berk

programme.title: Tips Deep Dish / Garbage Day
programme.desc: When Tip loses her voice, Oh finds a way to use his own voice to talk to her crush Keanu; Oh invents a way to redo yesterday so Tip can redeem a rotten day.

programme.title: Spin Cycle
programme.desc: When a segment on Xixis show changes the kingdom Julien begins scheming ways to use the influence of the show to his advantage and creates a Juliencentric propaganda machine

programme.title: Lucky and the Flight of the Fancy
programme.desc: Lucky, Julian and Aunt Cora get swept away in Julian’s new hot air balloon and must fend for themselves in the wilderness

programme.title: How To Train Your Titmouse/The Good The Bad And The Bugly
programme.desc: Turbo takes Beakless under his wing during a battle of snails vs. birds; Chet is Sheriff of a western Turbotown and fights a gang of outlaw crickets.

programme.title: Blood Duel
programme.desc: When Zarkon demands a tradeoff, the team has a difference of opinion on what to do; Meanwhile, Haggarobsesses over the past

programme.title: Scrambled Eggs/George Stephenson
programme.desc: Sherman accidentally swaps a class project with a dinosaur egg that hatches on stage, so Peabody must help to send it back before it ruins the show

programme.title: Count On Fifi
programme.desc: Fifi and Bumble deliver lots of delicious honey to Poppys stall. They lose a pot on the way and there isnt enough to go round. Can they find the missing pot, or will Stingo have to go without his honey for tea?

programme.title: Poppy The Line Dancing Queen
programme.desc: Poppy is having a line dancing party, but none of the other flowertots know how to do it. Will any of them learn to dance in time or will Poppy have to cancel the party?

programme.title: The Case Of The Toyland Mischief Maker
programme.desc: When Big Ears teapot goes missing, Noddy is surprised to find it hanging from a lamp post. And when Bumpys kennel goes missing too, its clear theres a mischief maker in Toyland. Noddy needs to investigate before Toyland descends into chaos. Using his investigating kit and with Revs and Bumpy to help, Noddy discovers that it was the Naughticorns playing a game of Dare and daring each other to do silly things.

programme.title: The Case Of The Popping Balloons
programme.desc: Noddy and his friends are each given a balloon at the end of Smartysauruss Science Party. But when lots of the balloons start going pop, Noddy decides to investigate why. Realising that someone must be hiding and popping them, he follows the clues to PatPat and then to the Naughticorns before eventually working out that the balloon poppers are the Ninjas.

programme.title: Why Wildebeest Stampede
programme.desc: You see there was a time when Wildebeest didnt stampede. They used to stand on the plains and munch grass all day. But there were so many of them and they were eating so much grass that all the animals had to do something about it. Tortoise realized that the Wildebeest werent the brightest animals in Tinga Tinga and they always did whatever the last beast said.

programme.title: Why Chameleon Changes Colour
programme.desc: You see there was a time when Chameleon wasnt bright and colourful at all. In fact Chameleon was rather dull and grey… like a rainy day. One day when all the animals are playing games and sheltering from the rains Chameleon decides to slip away because he feels boring. Butterfly comes across Chameleon sitting sadly on a rock and shows him a rainbow.

programme.title: Homesick Tin Top
programme.desc: Tin Top just cant master corners no matter how hard he tries. The other cars try to help him to no avail… until Roary hits on a brilliant plan.

programme.title: Save Our Tree
programme.desc: Mr Carburettor is planning on cutting down Flashs tree. What can be done to save the poor rabbits home?

programme.title: King Burple
programme.desc: After Burple and Cutter crash-land in a village of tiny dragons, Burples unintentional act of courage leads the locals to crown him as their king.

programme.title: Tail to the Chief / Chaser and Chewer: Part Chew
programme.desc: When Tag volunteers to be Mayor for the day, she promises everyone an ice cream party. But as she tries to do everything herself, the party plans begin to fall apart. Until Tag realizes that being a great Mayor means knowing when to ask for help. / Comic book villains Flea and Thunder (aka Frank and Beans) have teamed up with a Wicked Chicken to cause chicken-related havoc on Pawston. Heroes Chaser and Chewer (aka Tag and Scooch), team up with Flora Fedora (Lady Lydia) to save the town.

programme.title: Prey Time
programme.desc: When the Senior Puss Squad is in trouble and needs his help, Puss is alone in the woods trying to survive an unknown assassins dangerous attack

programme.title: Captain Underpants And The Disturbing Dilemma Of The Dysfunctional Doppelgangers
programme.desc: The crew meets their blue-hued doppelgängers when they crash-land on an alien planet where kids call all the shots.

programme.title: The Pangea-ing
programme.desc: There is more epic action and intrigue as Po and the Dragon Knights continue their quest to destroy the Tianshang weapons, but find themselves in treacherous waters when they are captured by pirates, one of which is out for revenge against Mr. Ping! The adventures lead them to London, where they are wanted by the Knights. Old enemies resurface and Blade will have to face one of her most challenging opponents-her mom.

programme.title: Potty Mouth
programme.desc: After a baby says a swear word on live television (censored by child-friendly online filter Sheriff Potty Pardner), Boss becomes obsessed with proving that the baby was taught this filth by their new arch-nemesis, Lumpy the Park Duck. Meanwhile, Tinas search to find what that swear word means creates unintentional havoc for both Tabithas research paper and for Baby Corps online systems when Sheriff Potty Pardner gives them an "internet time out"

programme.title: Not Lout
programme.desc: When Snotlout screws up a mission, he must learn to be a leader and earn the trust of the other riders.

programme.title: That Sinking Feeling
programme.desc: When Masikura convinces King Julien that the island is sinking, Julien believes building an ark is the only way to save his people

programme.title: Charged Up
programme.desc: Magnuss superpowered mechano-dragon threatens to replace the Riders. But when it spirals out of control, the towns real heroes have to step up!

programme.title: Mailed Away / The Wandering Wand
programme.desc: When Harper unknowingly drops her cooking camp application on the way to post office, it’s up to the Dew Drops to get it into that big blue mailbox. / When Cassie accidentally places Lolas beloved, old toy wand in a box marked for a giveaway drive in the park, the Dew Drops must find a way to retrieve the wand before it ends up in the hands of an entirely new family.

programme.title: Little Sisters / Tricky Treasure
programme.desc: Kelp and Pixie forget about their little sisters and their plans to hang out. Scallop goes to Unicorn Land and meets Juniper. They play and become friends. / The unicorns are eager to play with a new mystery item that washes up on the beach, but what is it? While the other unicorns come up with imaginative ideas of what it could be, Pixie is determined to find out exactly what it is.

programme.title: The Great Paper Chase / Home Is Where Kens Heart Is
programme.desc: When Rodney draws and writes his own comic book, TZG secretly helps him transport it to the comic book store where creator Ken KaBlam is on the hunt for new talent. / When Ken KaBlam gets homesick for his own hometown of Crostonburg, TZG secretly recreates the things me misses in Harmony Harbor.

programme.desc: When the Duchess comes to town declaring that she is ready to start a family, the Orphans have a competition to see who will be the lucky adoptee

programme.title: Chain Of Command
programme.desc: Krogen is on the hunt for dragon lenses and Snotlout and Minden do their best to defend Wing Island. Back in Berk Dagur and Mala feud over keeping the lenses safe

programme.title: Very Foreign Exchange Student / Pigs Tail
programme.desc: Tips new friend, the Roidian, stays with the Tuccis in hopes of learning from humans; Tip accidentally swaps bodies with Pig.

programme.title: Night Creatures
programme.desc: King Julien cant sleep so he decides to go on a milk cleanse to help but after Todd is attacked by a horrible monster King Juliens nightmares cause the kingdom to question him as...THE NIGHT CREATURE

programme.title: Lucky and the Jam Jam
programme.desc: The PALs try to figure out why Marciela is acting so weird, while Miradero is gripped by April Fool’s Day fever

programme.title: Shell On Wheels/Keep On Truckin
programme.desc: Skidmark competes with rich snail Shellsworth to build a railroad; Turbo and Chet roadtrip with their trucker dad and protect their cargo from bandits.

programme.title: Postmortem
programme.desc: Tensions run high within team Voltron as they discuss Lotor’s fate and try to figure out their next move

programme.title: Big Top Peabody/Taj Mahal
programme.desc: In a circus-themed show, Peabody and Sherman break their glasses and cant see their circus shenanigans, which creates a wacky spectacle to be seen

programme.title: King Stingo
programme.desc: Aunt Tulip has lost Grubby again. When Stingo finds him, he asks to be made King as a reward. It isnt long before he has gone too far and the tots are all fed up with his demands. Can Fifi get life in the garden back to normal?

programme.title: Hide And Seek
programme.desc: The tots are playing hide and seek and the winner will get Fifis delicious jam tarts. Who will win, Stingo and Slugsy are sure it will be them!

programme.title: The Case Of The Pink Lettuces
programme.desc: Something very strange is happening at the farm - all Farmer Toms lettuces have been painted pink! Farmer Tom is really upset so Noddy offers to investigate. After talking to PatPat and Smartysaurus he realises that the Ninjas had asked Smartysaurus to make them pink paint so that they could paint the lettuces. They were using them as pom-poms to cheerlead Pink Ninja as she ran the Toyland Marathon Race! The Ninjas are very sorry that they upset Farmer Tom but he tells them that its alright.

programme.title: The Case Of The Missing Jigsaw Puzzle Pieces
programme.desc: When some pieces from Big Ears jigsaw puzzle go missing, Noddy investigates: where are the missing pieces? He soon realises someone must have taken them and draws up a list of suspects. Having discounted the Pirates and then the Naughticorns, Noddy is baffled. But when Pat-Pat and the Pockets invite him to share a piece of toy cake, Noddy suddenly has a breakthrough: maybe it wasnt one toy who took lots of pieces but lots of toys who each took one piece.

programme.title: Why Leopard Has Spots
programme.desc: You see there was a time when Leopard didnt have spots. All the animals had something special; Lion had his mane, Peacock his beautiful tail, Zebra his stripes… but Leopard was as plain as plain can be. Then one day Leopard made friends with Puff Adder with his bright colourful spots. Tales from Africa.

programme.title: Why Hyena Has Short Back Legs
programme.desc: You see there was a time when Hyena didnt have short back legs. He was always chasing around and nipping other animals on the bottom. Then one day the animals had enough. It was time to teach that naughty Hyena a lesson! Tales from Africa.

programme.title: New Juice
programme.desc: Conrod is visiting Silver Hatch to try out some new bio fuel. But Big Chris fears something is wrong with it after he comes out in spots after sampling a smoothie made from the same produce. What or who could be at fault?

programme.title: Fb For Football
programme.desc: The cars are having a football tournament down at the beach. FB learns that if he relaxes, his natural footballing skills will shine through.

programme.title: Game of Horns
programme.desc: At a big town festival, Magnus challenges Duggard in a competition to be chief of Huttsgalor! Can the Riders help their friend keep his helmet?

programme.title: The Puppy Whisperer / Doggy Book of World Records
programme.desc: Tag becomes jealous when Yip prefers to spend time with puppy-sitter Beans instead of with her. Determined to win Yip back, Tag enlists the help of Cheddar Biscuit, Gilber, Spike and Frank to try and win him back. / Frank and Beans find out that Tag and Scooch are trying to get into the Doggy Book of World Records and sabotage every attempt. When Tag and Scooch find out what the sneaky duo are up to, they come up with a plan to outsmart them.

programme.title: Breaking Good
programme.desc: When Dulcinea sets up a school to teach unruly thieves how to be good, Uli takes the idea too far and its up to Puss to make San Lorenzo normal

programme.title: Captain Underpants And The Confusing Crisis Of The Conniving Captive
programme.desc: Melvin isnt exactly their friend ... but its not like George and Harold can just let him be held captive by diabolical Biglyans, right? Right?!?

Boss makes up his own imaginary friend to get out of these meetings, but after Tina gets a whiff that he may be lying, hes forced to keep up the charade at work and at home.

programme.title: Saving Shattermaster
programme.desc: When Mala and the Defenders of the Wing find a mysterious stranger who looks suspiciously like Dagur, Hiccup and Heather go to investigate.

programme.title: The Jungle Rooster
programme.desc: When the Jungle Rooster keeps him up at night, Julien discovers that the Foosa have been farming chickens for food and risks his life to free them all

programme.title: The Nest
programme.desc: When the Rescue Riders save Viking chief Duggard, they’re invited to visit his village of Huttsgalor, where they must prove theyre kind and helpful.

programme.title: The Yarn Fairy / Bake It ‘Til You Make It
programme.desc: When the trees start losing their leaves, Phoebe begins knitting the trees in the park sweaters, but when the neighborhood kids see the sweaters they think theyre a mysterious "Yarn Fairy," and they want to see her in action, making it much harder for the Dews to put more sweaters on the latest trees that have lost their leaves.

Now it’s up to the Dew Drops to get the penny across town and back into Marcus’ pocket before showtime. / When Nicholas rolls the hamster ball (with Hammy inside) out into the streets, the Dew Drops must get Hammy back home safely.

programme.title: Tips Deep Dish / Garbage Day
programme.desc: When Tip loses her voice, Oh finds a way to use his own voice to talk to her crush Keanu; Oh invents a way to redo yesterday so Tip can redeem a rotten day.

programme.title: Very Foreign Exchange Student / Pigs Tail
programme.desc: Tips new friend, the Roidian, stays with the Tuccis in hopes of learning from humans; Tip accidentally swaps bodies with Pig.

programme.title: Lucky and the Doubtful Drought
programme.desc: When Grayson has the only working well during an unexpected heat wave, Lucky has to find an alternate source of water

programme.title: Lucky and the Arabian Nightmares
programme.desc: When Al goes out of town, he puts the PALs in charge of the ramada, but they get more than they bargained for when three trouble-making horses escape

programme.title: Lucky and the Fearless Fillies
programme.desc: When the PALs and Snips get caught in a sandstorm, the girls must keep Snips calm and safe

programme.title: Sitting Ducks
programme.desc: Boss, Tina, JJ, Dez and Pip willfully get babysat by the Uncuddleables, planning to expose them as horrible sitters via secret, hidden cameras. But the plan is thrown for a loop when Tinas first night alone without her parents makes her fall for their sitter Mia as a "substitute mommy." Meanwhile, Nannycam uses the babysitting distraction to sneak into the Uncuddleables secret garage hideout to gather intel with her own "B field team."

programme.title: The Big Dumpling
programme.desc: The Uncuddleables have struck the Lil Dumpling baby pageant, replacing all of Baby Corps super-cute top 5%er babies with not-cute bottom 5%ers. Boss, Tina and their field team race to caravan the 5%ers from their homes to the pageant before Nannycam deploys the nuclear option of unleashing the dangerously cute UBO on stage to salvage a Lil Dumpling win.

programme.title: The Great Medieval London Fire 1135
programme.desc: Boss Baby and Tina reject the 5%er system that says the cuter you are, the more love you deserve. Teaming up with the Uncuddleables, the team tries to take down the system from within, forming a resistance of the eight department heads of Baby Corp in the hopes of changing the way we look at Baby Love forever.

programme.title: The Dragon Knights Part 2
programme.desc: There is more epic action and intrigue as Po and the Dragon Knights continue their quest to destroy the Tianshang weapons, but find themselves in treacherous waters when they are captured by pirates, one of which is out for revenge against Mr. Ping! The adventures lead them to London, where they are wanted by the Knights. Old enemies resurface and Blade will have to face one of her most challenging opponents-her mom.

programme.title: The Battle of Tianshang Part 1
programme.desc: There is more epic action and intrigue as Po and the Dragon Knights continue their quest to destroy the Tianshang weapons, but find themselves in treacherous waters when they are captured by pirates, one of which is out for revenge against Mr. Ping! programme.title: Viking For Hire
programme.desc: Now that dragon-killing is no longer necessary, Hiccup tries to find a new job for Gobber the Blacksmith, but the task proves harder than expected.

programme.title: WCCB Jean Pascal vs. Michael Eifert
programme.desc: In this episode Jean Pascal (36-6-1, 20 KOs) and Michael Eifert (11-1, 4 KOs) battle it out in the main event from Place Bell in Laval, Canada. The contest pits Haitian-Canadian former world champion and a contender from Germany. The pair squares off in this 12 round IBF light heavyweight title eliminator.

programme.title: Biomechanics of Punches and Kicks
programme.desc: In this episode, we learn about how the use of motion animation technology can help martial artists learn more efficient ways to put extra power behind their punches and kicks.

programme.title: Budapest 2023 - Episode 1
programme.desc: The highest level of competition in the sport of karate anywhere in the world will take place from Budapest, Hungary, as the WKF SENIOR WORLD CHAMPIONSHIPS take place. The top competitors from across the globe, from six different continents, will all converge on Budapest to stake their claim as the best in the world. Dont miss the WKF SENIOR WORLD CHAMPIONSHIPS, only on FIGHT SPORTS.

programme.title: KNOCKOUTS! Floyd Mayweather, Jr. vs. Oscar De La Hoya
programme.desc: The main event in this episode is a heavily-anticipated contest featuring two of boxings greats - Floyd Mayweather, Jr. and Oscar De La Hoya. This fight set the record for most pay-per-view buys, as 2.4 million purchases led to over $135 million in revenue. The winner of this closely-contested bout would be WBC light middleweight champion.

programme.title: Tokyo, Japan: Show 2
programme.desc: For the first time the top ranked sumo competitors in the world are featured in an action packed series, FIGHT SPORTS GRAND SUMO. This new format presents Sumo in an authentic, in-depth and entertaining way covering the rules, ranks, match-ups, and more. Show 2 featuring Chiyonokuni, Tamawashi, Takayasu and Chiyotairyu from the Aki basho, 2018.

programme.title: FIGHT SPORTS WCK Nordin Ben Moh vs Albert Kraus
programme.desc: WCK features intense, nonstop battles in both freestyle kickboxing and Muay Thai from around the world. Its kickboxings most talented athletes at their finest! This episode, from Eindhoven, the Netherlands, features main event Nordin Ben Moh (Morocco) vs. Albert Kraus (the Netherlands).

programme.title: WCCB Artur Beterbiev vs. Tavoris Cloud
programme.desc: Coming off a tremendous amateur career where he captured Gold Medals in the World Championships and European Championships, Olympian Artur Beterbiev takes a big step up in competition in just his 6th pro fight, taking on former IBF Light Heavyweight World Champion Tavoris Cloud. Beterbiev had stormed through his first five opponents, scoring four knockouts, two of which took place in the first round.

programme.title: In California, USA
programme.desc: Episode 10: California, USA - Hosts Jimmy Smith and Doug Anderson learn the Fight Discipline of Kajukenbo and the Martial Art of Hands, Feet and Throws with Masters Charles Gaylord and Greg Harper.

programme.title: KNOCKOUTS! Paul Williams vs. Antonio Margarito
programme.desc: The main event in this episode is a WBO welterweight title bout featuring then-undefeated Paul Williams and Antonio Margarito. Its a closely scored bout, but one fighters push towards a strong finish may have put him ahead just enough.

programme.title: Tokyo, Japan: Show 3
programme.desc: For the first time the top ranked sumo competitors in the world are featured in an action packed series, FIGHT SPORTS GRAND SUMO. programme.title: World Team Championships
programme.desc: Judo for the World features the best competitors in the sport as they compete in a global tour for an opportunity to vie for the gold in the World Judo Championship. In this episode we see the best judo of the World Team Championships from Budapest, where we will see history made as its the first time a new mixed gender team format will be seen.

programme.title: Frank Mir, Urijah Faber, Jon Fitch and more!
programme.desc: This episode features interviews with 2-time UFC heavyweight champion Frank Mir where he discusses his "Legend" Status and his UFC debut, as well as an interview with his wife and manager Jenny Mir and how she juggles motherhood and her husbands career. UFC President Dana White stops by and checks out some possible TUF competitors.

programme.desc: Five time World Champion and boxing superstar Gervonta Tank Davis and undefeated World Champion Hector Luis Garcia kick off the year by headlining a stacked card from the Capital One Arena in Washington DC. Davis has established himself as one boxings must-see attractions, and will be defending his WBA Lightweight World Championship against Garcia in the Main Event.

programme.title: KNOCKOUTS! Bernard Hopkins vs. Winky Wright
programme.desc: The main event in this episode is a light heavyweight title contest featuring 47-4-1 Bernard Hopkins and the 51-3-1 Winky Wright, who has not lost a bout in over seven years.

programme.title: Tokyo, Japan: Show 4
programme.desc: For the first time the top ranked sumo competitors in the world are featured in an action packed series, FIGHT SPORTS GRAND SUMO. Show 4 featuring Goeido, Abi, Kisenosato and Tochinoshin from the Aki basho, 2018.

programme.title: Macho: The Hector Camacho Story
programme.desc: This series takes a hard-hitting look at the rise, fall and untimely death of one of boxings most colorful champions. Hector Camachos dynamic speed, footwork and power made him a fighter to be reckoned with, but it was his flamboyance and showmanship that ushered in a new era in boxing. The series chronicles his epic battles inside the ring, his struggles with addiction outside of it and the mystery of the double homicide that claimed his life.

programme.title: Tuesday Night Fights Hector Camacho vs. Rusty Derouen
programme.desc: FIGHT SPORTS revisits some of Hector Camachos best fights from the legendary USAs Tuesday Night Fights series alongside our new documentary series Macho: The Hector Camacho Story. In this episode Hector Macho Camacho (46-3-0, 20 KO) battles Rusty Derouen (33-6-0, 25 KO) in a 10-round Halbmittel contest from Erie, Pennsylvania, USA.

Davis has established himself as one boxings must-see attractions, and will be defending his WBA Lightweight World Championship against Garcia in the Main Event.

programme.title: Budpaest 2023 - Episode 2
programme.desc: The highest level of competition in the sport of karate anywhere in the world will take place from Budapest, Hungary, as the WKF SENIOR WORLD CHAMPIONSHIPS take place. The top competitors from across the globe, from six different continents, will all converge on Budapest to stake their claim as the best in the world. Dont miss the WKF SENIOR WORLD CHAMPIONSHIPS, only on FIGHT SPORTS.

programme.title: Wide World of Fights Shane Mosley vs. Saul (Canelo) Alvarez
programme.desc: This episode features the WBC light middleweight title bout when Shane Mosley battles Saul (Canelo) Alvarez, as well as kickboxing, sumo and more!

programme.title: KNOCKOUTS! Bernard Hopkins vs. Winky Wright
programme.desc: The main event in this episode is a light heavyweight title contest featuring 47-4-1 Bernard Hopkins and the 51-3-1 Winky Wright, who has not lost a bout in over seven years.

programme.title: Tokyo, Japan: Show 4
programme.desc: For the first time the top ranked sumo competitors in the world are featured in an action packed series, FIGHT SPORTS GRAND SUMO. This new format presents Sumo in an authentic, in-depth and entertaining way covering the rules, ranks, match-ups, and more. Show 4 featuring Goeido, Abi, Kisenosato and Tochinoshin from the Aki basho, 2018.

programme.title: Macho: The Hector Camacho Story
programme.desc: This series takes a hard-hitting look at the rise, fall and untimely death of one of boxings most colorful champions. Hector Camachos dynamic speed, footwork and power made him a fighter to be reckoned with, but it was his flamboyance and showmanship that ushered in a new era in boxing. The series chronicles his epic battles inside the ring, his struggles with addiction outside of it and the mystery of the double homicide that claimed his life.

programme.title: Tuesday Night Fights Hector Camacho vs. Rusty Derouen
programme.desc: FIGHT SPORTS revisits some of Hector Camachos best fights from the legendary USAs Tuesday Night Fights series alongside our new documentary series Macho: The Hector Camacho Story. In this episode Hector Macho Camacho (46-3-0, 20 KO) battles Rusty Derouen (33-6-0, 25 KO) in a 10-round Halbmittel contest from Erie, Pennsylvania, USA.

programme.title: FS MMA Bruno Capdeville vs. Ryan Brigham
programme.desc: BodogFIGHT features classic MMA matches involving some of your favorite fighters! Bruno Capdeville and Ryan Brigham put on a show in Evansville, IN, USA.

programme.title: Las Vegas Finale: Part 2

programme.title: Pandas Date
programme.desc: When a vendor at the Farmers Market (Lucy) sticks Panda with an EpiPen, reviving him after an allergic reaction, Panda comes to in the arms of his dream girl.

programme.title: Forgeti
programme.desc: When Gwen drags Ben along on a hike in search of the legendary Forgeti - a yeti that makes people forget they ever saw it - Ben is dubious.

programme.title: The Filth
programme.desc: Ben is tasked with cleaning the Rust Bucket but is soon tricked into letting the villainous and vile Fly Guys steal it.

programme.title: Clown College
programme.desc: While tailgating at a State U. homecoming football game, Ben teams up with Grandpa Maxs old college buddies to keep the crazy clown Zombozo from robbing the stadium blind at halftime.

programme.title: The Ring Leader
programme.desc: While winning big on a Sumo Slammers video game, Ben gets the idea to win a real wrestling match - until an intimidating wrestler named Iron Kyle decides to make it a true challenge.

programme.title: Take 10
programme.desc: While trying to film his own indie film, Ben accidentally lets the Bug Gang go free and when he takes the fight to their hidden lair, Ben has to take on their narcissistic leader - the Ant Queen.

programme.title: The Prince And The Valiant Quest
programme.desc: Prince Ivandoe and Bert set off on their heroic quest and, almost immediately, a winged serpent steals their map to Eagle Mountain.

programme.title: The Prince And The Chicken Of Doom
programme.desc: A fire-breathing Giant Chicken is destroying the local farmers prize vegetables. Prince Ivandoe vows to capture the Giant Chicken, but... gets captured by her instead.

programme.title: The Prince And The Sing-Songy Stag
programme.desc: When Prince Ivandoe valiantly sets free Brian the Bard, he discovers he is now stuck with him... until such time that Brian saves Prince Ivandoes life in return.

programme.title: The Prince And The Tears Of Triumph
programme.desc: In an effort to impress Jezebel the thiefstress, Prince Ivandoe and Bert set off to find the elusive Centicore.

programme.title: The Prince And The Turnip Tricksters
programme.desc: Prince Ivandoe vows to capture the turnip thief... the very worst type of thief!

programme.title: Sesame Street Song Day
programme.desc: Its Song Day on Sesame Street. Mia learns how to sing a song in Spanish with help from her friends Nina, Rosita, and Lalo. She learns that shes special just the way she is, no matter how much or little Spanish she speaks.

programme.title: The Flamingo Scoop
programme.desc: Fred the Flamingo is visiting Sesame Street for a family reunion. Elmo, Rudy, and Nina learn all about flamingos from why their smiles are upside down to how the color of their feathers change from white to pink.

programme.title: Christmas Class Reunion
programme.desc: Valedictorian Elle is determined to host a perfect 15-year high school reunion at Christmas. She finds unexpected support in bad boy Devin.

programme.title: Ben 10: Ben 10,010
programme.desc: Ben 10 joins forces with his future self.

programme.title: Peter Rabbit
programme.desc: Feature adaptation of Beatrix Potters classic tale of a rebellious rabbit trying to sneak into a farmers vegetable garden.

programme.title: Burrito
programme.desc: Grizz likes burritos. A lot. So much so that after a restaurant makes a bear-sized burrito, Grizz cant bring himself to eat such a majestic work of art so he carries it with him instead.

programme.title: Charlie
programme.desc: The Bears meet Charlie when he signs up on a home-sharing website to spend a weekend with the Bears and Charlie turns out to be the worst possible house guest for the Bears.

programme.title: Jean Jacket
programme.desc: The Bears find a bedazzled jean jacket in a dumpster. But after the Bears fight over who gets control of the jacket, they have to consider that their denim blessing has become a curse.

programme.title: Food Truck
programme.desc: The Bears open up a food truck after being disappointed by the food options available to them. They start selling their food to animals... until the animals go a little crazy.

programme.title: Primal
programme.desc: Have the Bears lost their survival instincts by living in the modern world? Grizz wants to know, so he purposely gets the Bears lost in the deep forest.

programme.title: Ben 24hrs
programme.desc: Ben and Gwen attempt to stay up all night for Adrenaland but Ben fails to utilise his alien powers to stay awake and starts causing disaster after disaster.

programme.title: Freaky Gwen Ben
programme.desc: Ben interferes with malicious magician Hexs quest for the Titan Gloves at a flea market and accidentally switches bodies with Gwen, forcing him to walk a mile in her shoes and vice-versa!

programme.title: Rustbucket Rip
programme.desc: During a tour of historic Oldeville, Ben finds a rare Sumo Slammers card. When Billy Billions claims the same card, Ben has to battle Billys high-tech drones which have hijacked the Rust Bucket!

programme.title: The Clocktopus
programme.desc: In a peaceful coastal town, Ben must not only face the archaic antagonist Steam Smythe and his latest creation - the Clocktopus - but also his deepest, darkest fear: squid!

programme.title: Growing Pains
programme.desc: During a stop at the superstore Shoppe, Ben and Gwen are transformed into babies by nanny-gone-nuts Nanny Nightmare, who will stop at nothing to reshape the world in the image of her day care.

programme.title: The Prince And The Swoony Swanstress
programme.desc: Prince Ivandoe and Bert take a lovely, but lost and confused, Swanstress under their wing.

programme.title: The Prince And The Feather Fluffer-Upper Part 1
programme.desc: Prince Ivandoe and Bert reluctantly agree to bring Princess Syllabob, of the Underwater Kingdom, an all-powerful Trident for her Sweet Sixteenth birthday.

programme.title: The Prince And The Feather Fluffer-Upper Part 2
programme.desc: Prince Ivandoe and Bert reluctantly agree to bring Princess Syllabob, of the Underwater Kingdom, an all-powerful Trident for her Sweet Sixteenth birthday.

programme.title: The Prince And The Feast Of The Fopdoodles
programme.desc: Prince Ivandoe reluctantly accepts an invitation to a Royal MidSwanner Feast.

programme.title: The Prince And The Boasty Boar
programme.desc: In an attempt to win the hand of Princess Jezabel, Boaris Von Tusk stages a tournament to prove that he is the greatest warrior in all The Five Kingdoms.

programme.title: A Home For Fido
programme.desc: Chris, Elmo and Abby help Fido feel proud that hes a frog and find the right habitat to live in.

programme.title: Sesame Streets Lunar New Year Celebration
programme.desc: Lily, Qui, and Ji-Young are celebrating Lunar New Year on Sesame Street. They share with their friends Elmo, Charlie, Alan, and Grover how their families celebrate the same holiday, doing some things the same and different in a lot of other ways, too.

programme.title: Beebo Saves Christmas
programme.desc: Beebo and his friends travel to the North Pole to help discover what truly makes Christmas meaningful.

programme.title: Justice League X Rwby: Super Heroes And Huntsmen Part One
programme.desc: The Justice League are in a world called Remnant. They have been transformed into teenagers! The heroes of Remnant find their world has been altered.

programme.title: Justice League X Rwby: Super Heroes And Huntsmen Part Two
programme.desc: On the heels of successfully escaping a deadly digital trap, the members of the Justice League emerge in their own world to discover that Grimm, ravenous creatures from Remnant, have overtaken Earth! In order to defeat the monsters, they must call on thei

programme.desc: When a very special cowboy hat once owned by President Reagan moseys into the shop, can Rick wrangle an offer? Next, Chum lights up when a glowing Pearl Jam painting rocks across the counter.

programme.title: Declaration Of Indepawndence
programme.desc: Rick heads to New York City to check out an original broadside of the Declaration of Independence. Will he put his John Hancock on the line for this multi-million-dollar piece of history?

programme.title: Invention Showdown
programme.desc: From the lightbulb to the automobile, these innovations changed the world. Host Peyton Manning unveils the top ten inventions of all time, as voted on by a panel of experts.

programme.title: Gross Out Icons
programme.desc: Gross-out humour is as old as human society itself, and so are the toys designed to capitalise on it. From a 1st century Roman Emperor who created the Whoopee cushion, gross equals big bucks for toymakers.

programme.title: Christmas Crazes
programme.desc: The Christmas crazes that helped transform holiday shopping into the frantic, no-holds-barred $1.1 trillion frenzy that it is today.

programme.title: Holiday Treats
programme.desc: The top-selling candy days of the year revolve around Easter, Valentines Day, and Halloween. And it all started with a few bold pioneers.

programme.title: Sacred Bones
programme.desc: Mankind has always pondered what happens after death and what we leave behind. Many wonder what power our bones may hold. Some believe bones can bring good luck or even allow us to speak with the dead.

programme.title: Whos Your Data
programme.desc: The team launches an incredible nighttime 200-drone light show experiment above the Triangle and the East Field leading to a startling sighting in the sky and new data that points toward possible answers.

programme.title: The Top Ten Alien Influencers
programme.desc: Giorgio Tsoukalos looks at mysterious teachers who have appeared throughout history and reveals The Top Ten Alien Influencers, who he believes provide the ultimate proof of extraterrestrial contact.

programme.title: The Search For Extraterrestrial Life
programme.desc: What could lie beyond the confines of the Milky Way? Are there galaxies similar to our own? Could they be capable of sustaining intelligent life? And is that life trying to contact us?

programme.title: Astonishing Bodies
programme.desc: From a headless chicken that lives over one year to an out-of-this-world "celestial body" where it rains molten glass, we explore the most astonishing bodies through these truly unbelievable stories.

programme.title: The MUFON Files
programme.desc: The Mutual UFO Network - better known as MUFON - is the worlds leading organisation devoted to the scientific investigation of unidentified aerial phenomena and other unexplained encounters.

programme.desc: The 2023/24 Premier League season will be forever remembered as one of the greatest campaigns ever. programme.title: PL STORIES
programme.desc: Widely regarded as the two best managers in Premier League history, Sir Alex Ferguson and Arsene Wenger went toe to toe on the touchline on numerous occasions over the years. But what made their rivalry so fierce? We take a look at the intense clashes, memorable moments on and off the pitch and the monumental impact their duels had on English footballs modern era.

programme.title: PL STORIES
programme.desc: In the first senior managers job of his career, Kieran McKenna has achieved something nobody else has managed this decade: Winning back-to-back promotions from League One to the Premier League, in the process ending Ipswichs 22-year absence from top flight football. We go behind the scenes with the team as they prepare for the opening game of the new season whilst also exploring the clubs unique history.

programme.title: PL Stories 2024/25
programme.desc: We gather a panel of experts to tackle a nearly impossible question: What truly is the Greatest Premier League Game Ever? Join two ex-footballers, a seasoned commentator, and a top football journalist as they lock horns in a passionate roundtable discussion. The panel revisits iconic moments, dissecting tactics, and legendary performances. Expect banter, bold claims, and maybe even a few surprises, as they strive to settle the debate-or perhaps keep it alive.

programme.title: The Big Interview 2024/25
programme.desc: Being the only player Pep Guardiola has signed twice, as well as being the first ever Manchester City captain to lift the Champions League, Ilkay Gundogan’s importance to the club cannot be understated. In this week’s Big Interview, we learn how a boy brought up in a German mining town, played under Jurgen Klopp at Borussia Dortmund, suffered multiple long-term injuries and bounced back stronger, became a club legend at City.

programme.title: Premier League 2024/25
programme.desc: This is Ruben Amorim’s first home league game in charge of Manchester United. Since the start of last season, the Portuguese has won all 22 of his home league games in charge of Sporting CP by an aggregate score of 72-13.

The race has acquired an international reputation, attracting skippers from all over the world.

programme.title: Homemade Love Story
programme.desc: At a boarding house called Samgwang Villa, three families from different worlds find themselves entangled through love, heartache and long-held secrets.

programme.title: Hilarious Family
programme.desc: This heartwarming drama tells the story of Du Ruyu (Liu Lin), a single mother who has been widowed for 18 years, raising her four daughters, each with very different personalities, on her own. The family is filled with both laughter and tears.

programme.title: Lo And Behold
programme.desc: This story revolves around the Hung family, their working lives and friends, as well as the ghost that the family befriends!

programme.title: Golden City
programme.desc: Set in the 60s in Jioufen, the story tells how three sworn brothers conquer the world with their bare hands. While connecting romance from the previous generation to the shared emotions with the present, the drama explores differences in generational values.

programme.title: Forensic Heroes VI: Redemption
programme.desc: Confronted with a series of complex mystery cases, Forensic Scientist Yu Xingbo (Bosco Wong), Inspector Jing Haoran (Benjamin Yuen), and Forensic Doctor Fan Peiqing (Jacky Cai) use science to unravel the mysteries step by step and uncover the truth.

programme.title: Are You The One
programme.desc: The story centers Liu Mian Tang (Wang Chu Ran), who is severely injured and rescued by Cui Xing Zhou (Zhang Wan Yi). Mian Tang mistakes Xing Zhou for her husband after waking up with amnesia. She follows him to guard the frontier, and eventually fall in love.

programme.title: Lo And Behold
programme.desc: This story revolves around the Hung family, their working lives and friends, as well as the ghost that the family befriends!

programme.title: Forensic Heroes V
programme.desc: The fifth installment of the Forensic Heroes series revolves around the Hong Kong Police Department working through forensics and criminal investigation, getting to the bottom of missing evidence and cunning criminals, and eventually giving justice to victims!

programme.title: Young Lady and Gentleman

programme.title: Hilarious Family

programme.title: Golden City

programme.title: Are You The One

programme.title: Movie - Thudikkum Karangal

programme.desc: The team find a "granny home" - a house that hasnt been updated in a long time, but has good bones and shouldnt take much work to flip. But the planned one-month renovation hits some snags.

programme.title: Married At First Sight Australia (S9)
programme.desc: The newlyweds embark on their honeymoon as one last couple take on their vows.

programme.title: Home Salon Makeover Or Texas Takeover
programme.desc: When Chessa and Tom first bought their fixer upper house, they were in need of a larger space for their family of three. Now one of Toms teenage sons is moving in with them, they need another bedroom.

programme.title: Daniel Boulud Cake
programme.desc: When Sofia earns an internship with Daniel Boulud, Buddy is tasked with making a cake for the famous French chef and his staff. But a New Jersey heatwave threatens to ruin everything.

programme.title: MasterChef USA (S13)
programme.desc: The remaining home chefs must tackle a classic test: the tag team challenge. Contestants must take turns preparing a delicious three-course meal, working together to ensure they are on the same page.

programme.title: MasterChef Australia (S15)
programme.desc: The remaining three are pitted against each other in a bid to claim the other two places. Entering the kitchen, they discover that todays Pressure Test has been set by none other than Peter Gilmore.

programme.title: Five Alarm Twists
programme.desc: Sound the fire alarm! These chefs have a penchant for peppers so theyre twisting classic foods and cranking the heat up. Grab a glass of milk because these twisted dishes will set your taste buds on fire.

However, many challenges, including personal obstacles, family troubles, and unbreakable relationships, stand in their way.

programme.title: Apprenticing to a Lone Doctor on Niijima (R)
programme.desc: What would I learn if I apprenticed myself to a general physician on an isolated island who faces all kinds of diseases alone? What is the true meaning of his actions like prolonged chats with patients, mysterious notes he handed over, stopping at a park on the way to a medical visit, and snapping a lot of pictures? These brings to light his belief in examining people as well as their illnesses. It also reveals the relationships that inspire the islanders with this way of thinking.

programme.desc: A heroine born into a kimono store family in Kishiwada, Osaka, holds admiration for clothing and discovers a sewing machine. The story depicts the life of a powerful woman who becomes a pioneer of Japan’s fashion design while overcoming many obstacles.

The story depicts the life of a powerful woman who becomes a pioneer of Japan’s fashion design while overcoming many obstacles.

programme.desc: Patrick and GrandPat try to pass each other on the stairs, leading to a ludicrous conflict. // The members of the Star family each confront their own absurd rivalries.

programme.desc: Plankton tells Patrick hes his conscience so he can convince the wooden-headed star to steal him a Krabby Patty. // When Mr. Krabs puts in an open kitchen, SpongeBob gets stage fright and has to invent a new persona.

programme.title: Plankton Paranoia / Library Cards
programme.desc: Plankton hasnt tried to steal the secret formula in a while...and thats making Mr. Krabs nervous! // When Patrick discovers the pineapples library, SpongeBob introduces him to the wonderful world of book learning!

programme.title: Karate Chops / Taco The Town
programme.desc: Used to being top dog, Carl cant handle when Adelaide joins his karate class and becomes the star student. // Hector starts selling Rosas delicious tacos but gets overwhelmed when theyre more popular than the mercado!

programme.title: Cover Girls / Save the Date
programme.desc: When all 10 of Lincolns sisters ask him to cover for them on the same day, Lincoln has his hands full. // Bobby and Lori go on a double date with Lincoln and Bobbys little sister, Ronnie Anne.

programme.title: House Music / A Novel Idea
programme.desc: Lincoln signs his family up for a talent show and they form a band. // Its Dads annual Take Your Daughter to Work Day so Mom offers to take Lincoln to her work: a dental office.

programme.title: The Yard Sale
programme.desc: GrandPat prevents his precious memories from being sold at a family yard sale.

programme.title: Little Yellow Book / Bumper to Bumper
programme.desc: Squidward finds SpongeBobs diary, and starts reading it out loud in the Krusty Krab. // SpongeBob once again fails his driving test, forcing Mrs. Puff to think outside the box--and off the road.

programme.title: The Shapeshiftian Candidate Part 1 and 2
programme.desc: Clawdeen organizes a Get Out the Vote concert with Catty Noir, but a shapeshifter threatens to ruin the event. // Stuck in a pocket dimension, Clawdeen and Romulus must work together to get back to Monster High before the concert.

programme.title: Mime Games
programme.desc: When Danger Force and Captain Man are called to Paris to protect Frances national treasures, Bose is accidentally left alone to try and stop The Toddler from breaking into The Mans Nest.

programme.title: Mika in the Middle
programme.desc: Mika gets a fine lesson on the art of not snitching, but a surprise from Schwozs Mom might cause her to fail the test.

programme.title: The Princess and the Everlasting Emerald: A Royal Woods Fairytale Part 1
programme.desc: On the quest to give Charlie the perfect gift to remember him by Lincoln and his family put all of their talents on the line for the first ever Loud-a-palooza to save Flips food and fuel.

programme.title: Scream Machine
programme.desc: When Charlottes invention for The Gizmo Show is accidentally destroyed and then rebuilt, Charlotte worries that the attention she gets could expose Kid Danger and Captain Mans secret identity.

programme.title: Trend Game / This Bird Has Flown
programme.desc: When Ronnie Anne realizes that shes not up to date on all of the latest trends, she seeks help from Carlota. // Bobby struggles to find Sergio after wishing he would fly away and never come back.

programme.title: V.I.Peeved / Senor Class
programme.desc: Carlota worries that her family will embarrass her after her vlog is discovered by a famous musician. // Hector becomes Ronnie Anne and Carls newest classmate after deciding to finish his schooling.

programme.title: Fast Feud / Never Friending Story
programme.desc: Ronnie Anne and Sid try to take down the obnoxious burger restaurant that opened up across the street. // After picking Par as his new best friend, Bobby realizes he may be in over his head.

programme.title: Driven to Drive
programme.desc: In a Patrick Show episode about boats, Cecil teaches Patrick how to drive.

programme.title: Legend of the Lost Bathroom
programme.desc: Patrick and Squidina embark on a quest to find the lost bathroom.

programme.title: Fun-Sized Friends / Grandmums the Word
programme.desc: SpongeBob and Patrick exchange tiny living versions of themselves. Its a whole hunk of homunculus fun! // Plankton tells his Grandma that he owns the Krusty Krab, but must keep the lie going when she comes to visit.

programme.title: City Slickers / Fool Me Twice
programme.desc: Lori and Lincoln visit the city. Lori struggles to be a city girl and Lincoln finds Ronnie Anne has changed. // The family has a new plan to dodge Luans April Fools Day pranking: stunt doubles

programme.title: Net Gains / Pipe Dreams
programme.desc: Lynn desperately wants to win a basketball championship but gets drafted onto a terrible team. // Mom and Dad are sick of waiting in the long bathroom line so they decide to build a secret bathroom.

programme.title: That Thing You Deuce / Werewolf Weekend
programme.desc: Deuce overworks himself to win a fundraiser, accidentally turning other students into rock candy treats. // Clawdeen opens up to her dad and learns they have a lot in common, while Cleo seeks followers in the human world.

programme.title: Sweet Dreams Are Made of Cheese
programme.desc: When Lucy and the Morticians Club bring a cursed wheel of cheese into the house Lincoln and Clyde must race to save everyone from their worst nightmares!

programme.title: Miles Has Visions
programme.desc: When AWOL starts seeing visions of the future right before they happen, Captain Man believes it must be the work of Swellviews leading time-crime villain, The Time Jerker.

programme.title: Captain Man Strikes Out
programme.desc: When Captain Man goes on strike because he refuses to pay for art that he destroyed on a mission, the Vice-Mayor hires a new hero to defend Swellview - Monsieur Man.

programme.title: Im Gonna Forget You, Sucka
programme.desc: After Cherry accidently posts a photo revealing the Thundermans secret, the Hero League forces Phoebe to do the unthinkable and end the relationship with her best friend.

programme.title: Dont Lose Your Head
programme.desc: Chaos ensues as Max and the Midknights try to break Uncle Budrick out of the castle before he is beheaded. With Mumblins help, they narrowly escape King Gastleys clutches and later learn from Kevyn that King Conrad is alive!

programme.title: Bye Tanya / What Lies Beneath
programme.desc: Leni must protect her mannequin friend Tanya when her boss, Ms. Carmichael, decides to update Reiningers. // When Dante buries a secret in The Royal Woods Cemetery, he must stop the Morticians Club from discovering what it is.

programme.title: The Loudest Mission: Relative Chaos
programme.desc: Bobby fits in great but Ronnie Anne struggles with the smothering nature of their relatives. Little do they know, their mother has a secret motive.

programme.title: Chancla Force / Fluff Love
programme.desc: Carl takes Rosas chancla, setting off the balance of order in the city, and calling the Chancla Force into action! // Carlitos goes on a wild adventure to get his favorite stuffed animal from the arcade.

programme.title: Mooned! / Hysterical History
programme.desc: SpongeBob wants to catch an ultra-rare jellyfish and enlists the help of former jellyfishing champion, Kevin. // On a trip to the museum, SpongeBob and Patrick teach Sandy all about Bikini Bottoms fascinating, yet questionable, history.

programme.title: Extreme Sports / Squirrel Record
programme.desc: SpongeBob and Patrick try to join the extreme sports team The Drasticals. // Sandy finds a book of worlds records, and tries to break them all with SpongeBobs help.

programme.title: Patrick-Man! / Garys New Toy
programme.desc: Patrick becomes the superhero Patrick-Man, who intends to clean up Bikini Bottom-whether it wants it or not. // Gary becomes obsessed with his new red ball, forcing SpongeBob to take drastic measures to intervene.

programme.title: License to Milkshake / Squid Baby
programme.desc: SpongeBob learns his milkshake license has expired, and is forced to go back to the milkshake academy. // Squidward hits his head and reverts to being a baby, and its up to SpongeBob and Patrick to take care of him.

programme.title: The Trouble With Hal
programme.desc: NCIS is called in to investigate when a lieutenant returns home on Halloween Eve to find a surprise party being thrown for someone else at his home.

programme.title: Sticks and Stones
programme.desc: After receiving intelligence on deadly threats to multiple locations that could lead to a catastrophic war, NCIS is called in to try to neutralize the danger.

programme.title: In From the Cold
programme.desc: NCIS works with the CIA to discover what secrets are being kept by Captain Butler, an elderly former spy with dementia.

programme.title: Knight and Day
programme.desc: Things become tense when Knight is assigned to protect his wife after the home of a high-level defense contractor is attacked.

programme.title: Battle In Seattle
programme.desc: Seattle broke into a full-scale state of emergency as thousands of protestors gathered in resistance to the World Trade Organization. The lives of the city’s mayor, a SWAT cop on the streets and his pregnant wife, and four demonstrators intersect in the ensuing riots.

programme.title: Roschach
programme.desc: Agent Clay consults with Benson when a woman is found gravely injured at a remote campground and the suspect could be anywhere along the Eastern Seaboard; Bruno and Silva take a chance on an odd hunch to see if it becomes a lead.

programme.title: Tenfold
programme.desc: Bruno must get to the center of a victim’s incomplete story to track down a serial rapist. Carisi is helpless to stop a crime he suspects is about to be committed.

programme.title: Three Bridges
programme.desc: Magnum and Higgins try to help Zhao, a close friend of Kumu, recover her life savings that was all lost to a scammer. TC becomes increasingly frustrated at the lack of progress in his recovery and pushes everyone away.

programme.title: Appetite For Danger
programme.desc: Magnum and Higgins enlist Katsumoto to go undercover when a chef at a high-end restaurant goes missing. Kumu works with Cade at the Cultural Center, confronting one of America’s darker chapters - the internment of Japanese Americans in the wake of Pearl Harbor.

programme.title: Night Has A Thousand Eyes
programme.desc: Magnum and Rick race to find a missing witness who can exonerate an innocent man accused of murder. TC tries to repair his relationship with Mahina after being released from the VA.

programme.title: Battle In Seattle
programme.desc: Seattle broke into a full-scale state of emergency as thousands of protestors gathered in resistance to the World Trade Organization. The lives of the city’s mayor, a SWAT cop on the streets and his pregnant wife, and four demonstrators intersect in the ensuing riots.

programme.title: The Draft, Smash Bash
programme.desc: The top 15 chefs are drafted into their three teams; the contestants must prepare an all-American smash burger that proves their cooking abilities.

programme.title: Curry In A Hurry
programme.desc: The 14 remaining chefs are tasked with preparing a curry dish that promises to pack a punch with only 30 minutes on the clock; the winning dish gives the entire team immunity and claims the top-level kitchen for the next challenge.

programme.title: The Draft, Smash Bash
